analyzed: arthavādaḥ ca tad arthavat
translated: And it is a commendatory statement, having the same meaning as that.

original: parakṛtipurākalpaṃ ca manuṣyadharmaḥ syād arthāya hy anukīrtanam / / / /
analyzed: parakṛti purākalpam ca manuṣya dharmaḥ syāt arthāya hi anukīrtanam  /
translated: And the account of the deeds of others and the ancient legends would be human dharma, because they are recited for the sake of.

analyzed: tad yukte ca pratiṣedhāt
translated: And because there is a prohibition in what is connected with that.

analyzed: nirdeśāt vā tad dharmaḥ syāt pañcāvatta vat
translated: Or it would be its dharma due to the direction, like the five-fold offering.

analyzed: vidhau tu veda saṃyogāt upadeśaḥ syāt
translated: But in the injunction, there would be a teaching due to the connection with the Veda.

original: arthavādo vā vidhiśeṣatvāt tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: arthavādaḥ vā vidhi śeṣa tvāt tasmāt nitya anuvādaḥ syāt
translated: Or it is a commendatory statement, because it is a supplement to the injunction, therefore it would be a constant restatement.

analyzed: sahasra saṃvatsaram tad āyuṣām asaṃbhavāt manuṣyeṣu
translated: The thousand-year life span of those is not possible among humans.

analyzed: api vā tad adhikārāt manuṣya dharmaḥ syāt
translated: Or it would be human dharma due to the authority of that.

analyzed: na a sāmarthyāt
translated: Not due to lack of ability.

analyzed: sambandha adarśanāt
translated: Due to the non-perception of a connection.

original: sa kulakalpaḥ syād iti kārṣṇājinir ekasminn asaṃbhavāt / / / /
analyzed: sa kula kalpaḥ syāt iti kārṣṇājiniḥ ekasmin asaṃbhavāt  /
translated: That is a family legend, says Kārṣṇājinī, because it is not possible in one.

original: api vā kṛtsnasaṃyogād ekasyaiva prayogaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā kṛtsna saṃyogāt ekasya eva prayogaḥ syāt
translated: Or due to the connection with the whole, the performance would be of only one.

original: vipratiṣedhāt tu guṇyanyataraḥ syād iti lāvukāyanaḥ / / / /
analyzed: vipratiṣedhāt tu guṇī anyataraḥ syāt iti lāvukāyanaḥ
translated: But due to the contradiction, it would be either the subordinate or the other, says Lāvudāyana.

analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ vicāli tvāt
translated: The year, due to its being changeable.

analyzed: sā prakṛtiḥ syāt adhikārāt
translated: That would be the original, due to the authority.

analyzed: ahāni vā abhisaṃkhya tvāt
translated: Or the days, because of the enumeration.

original: iṣṭipūrvatvād akratuśeṣo homaḥ saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu syād pūrvo 'py ādhānasya sarvaśeṣatvāt / / / /
analyzed: iṣṭi pūrva tvāt a kratu śeṣaḥ homaḥ saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu syāt ādhānasya sarva śeṣa tvāt  /
translated: The Homa is a subsidiary to the non-sacrifice, being preceded by the Iṣṭi, in the consecrated fires, even before the Ādhāna, because of the general statement about all.

original: iṣṭitve na tu saṃstavaś caturhotṝn asaṃskṛteṣu darśayati / / / /
analyzed: iṣṭi tve na tu saṃstavaḥ caturhotṝn a saṃskṛteṣu darśayati  /
translated: But in the case of the Iṣṭi, the praise does not show the four Homa offerings in the unconsecrated fires.

analyzed: upadeśaḥ tu apūrva tvāt
translated: But the instruction is because of the novelty.

analyzed: sa sarveṣām aviśeṣāt
translated: It is of all, because there is no distinction.

analyzed: api vā kratu abhāvāt anāhitāgneḥ aśeṣa bhūta nirdeśaḥ
translated: Or rather, the statement of the unconsecrated fire is complete, because of the absence of the sacrifice.

analyzed: japaḥ vā an agni saṃyogāt
translated: Or the Japa, because of the connection with the fire.

original: iṣṭitvena saṃstute homaḥ syād anārabhyāgnisaṃyogād itareṣām avācyatvāt / / / /
analyzed: iṣṭi tvena saṃstute homaḥ syāt an ārabhya agni saṃyogāt itareṣām a vācya tvāt  /
translated: The Homa would be by the Iṣṭi, because of the connection with the unconsecrated fire, because the others are not mentioned.

analyzed: ubhayoḥ pitṛyajña vat
translated: Of both, like the sacrifice to the ancestors.

analyzed: nirdeśaḥ vā anāhitāgneḥ an ārabhya agni saṃyogāt  /
translated: Or the instruction is of the unconsecrated fire, because of the connection with the unconsecrated fire.

analyzed: pitṛ yajñe saṃyuktasya punar vacanam
translated: The restatement of what is connected in the sacrifice to the ancestors.

analyzed: upanayan ādadhīta homa saṃyogāt
translated: One should perform the Ādhāna while performing the Upanaha, because of the connection with the Homa.

analyzed: sthapati iṣṭa vat laukike vā vidyā karma anupūrva tvāt
translated: Or in the worldly [Ādhāna], like the Sthapati-Iṣṭi, because of the sequence of knowledge and action.

analyzed: ādhānam ca bhāryā saṃyuktam
translated: And the Ādhāna is connected with the wife.

original: akarma cordhvam ādhānāt tatsamavāyo hi karmabhiḥ / / / /
analyzed: akarma ca ūrdhvam ādhānāt tad samavāyaḥ hi karmabhiḥ
translated: And there is no action above the Ādhāna, because it is connected with the actions.

analyzed: śrāddha vat iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is like a Śrāddha, . . .

analyzed: na śruti vipratiṣedhāt
translated: No, on account of the contradiction of the Śruti.

analyzed: sarva artha tvāt ca putra arthaḥ na prayojayet  /
translated: And on account of the all-embracing character of the son, the object of the injunction is not to be employed.

original: somapānāt tu prāpaṇaṃ dvitīyasya tasmād upayacchet / / / /🔽pitṛyajñe tu darśanāt prāg ādhānāt pratīyeta / / / /
analyzed: soma pānāt tu prāpaṇam dvitīyasya tasmāt upayacchet  / pitṛ yajñe tu darśanāt prāk ādhānāt pratīyeta  /
translated: But on account of the drinking of Soma, the second is obtained; therefore he should marry.🔽But in the sacrifice to the manes, on account of the declaration, it should be understood before the setting up of the sacred fires.

original: sthapatīṣṭiḥ prayājavad agnayādheyaṃ prayojayet tādarthyāc cāpavṛjyeta / / / /
analyzed: sthapati iṣṭiḥ prayāja vat agnayādheyam prayojayet tādarthyāt ca apavṛjyeta  /
translated: The Sthapati sacrifice, like the Prayāja, should be employed in the setting up of the sacred fires, and on account of the object being accomplished, it would be excluded.

analyzed: api vā laukike gnau syāt ādhānasya a sarva śeṣa tvāt  /
translated: Or it should be in the ordinary fire, because the setting up of the sacred fires is not subsidiary to all.

analyzed: avakīrṇi paśuḥ ca tadvat ādhānasya aprāpta kala tvāt  /
translated: And the animal sacrifice for one who has had intercourse with a menstruating woman is like that, because the setting up of the sacred fires is not a necessary preliminary.

analyzed: udagayana pūrvapakṣa ahar puṇya aheṣu daivāni smṛti rūpāni ā artha darśanāt  /
translated: And the divine rites are on the northern solstice, the dark fortnight, and auspicious days, on account of the sight of other purposes in the Smṛtis.

analyzed: ahani ca karma sākalyam  /
translated: And on the day, the whole rite is performed.

analyzed: itareṣu tu pitryāṇi
translated: But the rites for the manes are on the other days.

analyzed: yācñā krayaṇam a vidyamāne lokavat  /
translated: If there is no (cow), the purchase is by begging, as in the world.

analyzed: niyatam vā arthava tvāt syāt
translated: But it should be fixed, because it has a purpose.

analyzed: tathā bhakṣa praiṣāt chādana saṃjñapta homa dveṣam
translated: Similarly, the covering, the announcement, and the oblation are for the sake of the food-offering.

analyzed: anarthakam tu anityam syāt
translated: But that which is useless should be non-eternal.

analyzed: paśu codanāyām aniyamaḥ viśeṣāt
translated: In the injunction regarding the animal sacrifice, there is no restriction, because there is no specification.

analyzed: chāgaḥ vā mantra varṇāt
translated: Or a goat, by reason of the mantra text.

analyzed: na codanā virodhāt
translated: And not by reason of the contradiction of the injunction.

analyzed: ārṣeya vat iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is like the son of a re-married woman,

original: na tatra hy acoditvāt / / / /🔽niyamo vaikārthyaṃ hy arthabhedād bhedaḥ pṛthavatvenābhidhānāt / / / /
analyzed: na tatra hi a codi tvāt  niyamaḥ vā aikārthyam hi artha bhedāt bhedaḥ pṛthava tvena abhidhānāt
translated: No, because there it is not enjoined.🔽The rule is, because of the difference of purpose; the difference is by reason of the difference of meaning, because of the declaration of the difference.

analyzed: aniyamaḥ vā artha antara tvāt anya tvam vyatireka śabda bhedābhyām
translated: The non-rule is, because of the difference of meaning; the difference is by reason of the difference of words and the exclusion.

original: rūpāl liṅgāc ca / / / /🔽chāge na karmākhyā rūpaliṅgābhyām / / / /
analyzed: rūpāt liṅgāt ca  chāge na karma ākhyā rūpa liṅgābhyām
translated: By reason of the form and the indication.🔽In the goat, by reason of the name of the rite and the form and the indication.

analyzed: rūpa anya tvāt na jāti śabdaḥ syāt
translated: By reason of the difference of form, it should not be a word denoting a class.

analyzed: vikāraḥ na autpattika tvāt
translated: The modification is not, because of the non-origination.

analyzed: sa naimittikaḥ paśoḥ guṇasya a codita tvāt  /
translated: That is occasional, because of the non-enjoinedness of the quality of the animal.

analyzed: jāteḥ vā tad prāya vacana arthava tvābhyām
translated: Or of the class, by reason of the sense of the statement of the general rule and the sense of the text.

original: śrutipramāṇatvāc cheṣāṇāṃ mukhyabhede yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: śruti pramāṇa tvāt śeṣāṇām mukhya bhede yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt
translated: By reason of the authority of the Śruti, in the difference of the principal, there would be the existence according to the right.

analyzed: utpatti artha avibhāgāt vā sattva vat aikadharmyam syāt
translated: Or by reason of the non-division for the sake of origination, there would be the unity of the quality like the existence.

original: codanāśeṣabhāvād vā tadbhedād vyavatiṣṭherann utpatter guṇabhūtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: codanā śeṣa bhāvāt vā tad bhedāt vyavatiṣṭheran utpatteḥ guṇa bhūta tvāt
translated: Or by reason of the existence of the remainder of the injunction, they would be distinguished by reason of the difference of that, because of the subordinate character of the origination.

analyzed: sattve lakṣaṇa saṃyogāt sārvatrikam pratīyeta
translated: In the existence, by reason of the connection with the definition, it should be understood as universal.

analyzed: avibhāgāt tu na evam syāt
translated: But it would not be so because of non-division...

analyzed: dvi artha tvam ca vipratiṣiddham
translated: And the dual purpose is contradictory...

original: utpattau vidhyabhāvād vā codanāyāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt tataś ca karmabhedaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: utpattau vidhi abhāvāt vā codanāyām pravṛttiḥ syāt tatas ca karma bhedaḥ syāt
translated: Or because there is no injunction in the origination, the application would be in the injunction, and from that there would be a difference in the rites...

original: yadi vāpy abhidhānavat sāmānyāt sarvadharmaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: yadi vā api abhidhāna vat sāmānyāt sarva dharmaḥ syāt
translated: Or if it were like the designation, the universal would be the property of all...

original: arthasya tv avibhaktatvāt tathā syād abhidhāneṣu pūrvavattvāt prayogasya karmaṇaḥ śabdabhāvyatvād vibhāgāc cheṣāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt / / /
analyzed: arthasya tu avibhakta tvāt tathā syāt abhidhāneṣu pūrvavat tvāt prayogasya karmaṇaḥ śabda bhāvya tvāt vibhāgāt śeṣāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: But because of the undivided nature of the object, it would be so in the designations, because of the prior nature of the application of the rite, because of the verbal nature of the rite, because of the division, there would be no application of the subsidiaries...

analyzed: smṛtiḥ iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is memory...

analyzed: na pūrvavat tvāt
translated: No, because of the prior nature...

original: arthasya śabdabhāvyatvāt prakaraṇanibandhanāc chabdād evānyatra bhāvaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: arthasya śabda bhāvya tvāt prakaraṇa nibandhanāt śabdāt eva anyatra bhāvaḥ syāt
translated: Because of the verbal nature of the object, the existence would be elsewhere from the word itself based on the context...

analyzed: sāmāne pūrvavat tvāt utpanna adhikāraḥ syāt
translated: If it is argued that it would be the origination of the authority because of the prior nature in the common...

analyzed: śyenasya iti ca iti
translated: If it is argued that it is of the hawk...

analyzed: na a sannidhānāt
translated: No, because of the non-proximity...

original: api vā yady apūrvatvād itaradadhikārthe jyautiṣṭomikād vidhes tadvācakaṃ samānaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā yadi apūrva tvāt itara dadhika arthe jyautiṣṭomikāt vidheḥ tad vācakam samānam syāt  /
translated: Or if it is argued that because of the novelty, the other would be the same in expressing the injunction for the purpose of the Jyotiṣṭoma...

analyzed: pañca sañcareṣu arthavāda atideśaḥ sannidhānāt
translated: The extension of the Arthavāda is based on proximity in the five Saṃcaras...

analyzed: sarvasya vā aikaśabdyāt  /
translated: Because of the singularity of the word for all...

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the indication of the Linga...

analyzed: vihita āmnānāt na iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is not so because of the injunction of what is enjoined...

analyzed: na itara artha tvāt
translated: No, because it is not for another purpose...

analyzed: eka kapāla aindrāgnau ca tadvat
translated: And in the case of the Ekakapāla for Indra-Agni, it is the same...

original: ekakapālānāṃ vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtir āgrayaṇe sarvahomāparivṛttidarśanād avabhṛthe ca sakṛd dvyavadānasya vacanāt / / / /
analyzed: eka kapālānām vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ āgrayaṇe sarva homa a parivṛtti darśanāt avabhṛthe ca sakṛt dvi avadānasya vacanāt  /
translated: The Ekakapālas have the Vaiśvadeva as their archetype, because of the appearance of the complete offering of all oblations in the Āgrayana, and because of the statement of the single twofold offering in the Avabhṛtha...

analyzed: sāmnaḥ bhidhāna śabdena pravṛttiḥ syāt yathā śiṣṭam
translated: The application would be by the word denoting the Sāman, as instructed...

original: śabdais tv arthavidhitvād arthāntare 'pravṛttiḥ syāt pṛthagbhāvāt kriyāyā hy abhisambandhaḥ / / / /
analyzed: śabdaiḥ tu artha vidhi tvāt artha antare pravṛttiḥ syāt pṛthagbhāvāt kriyāyāḥ hi abhisambandhaḥ  /
translated: But by the words, because of the injunction of the meaning, there would be no application in another case, because of the separateness, for the action is connected...

original: svārthe vā syāt prayojanaṃ kriyāyās tadaṅgabhāvenopadiśyeran / / / /
analyzed: sva arthe vā syāt prayojanam kriyāyāḥ tad aṅga bhāvena upadiśyeran
translated: Or in its own meaning, there would be a purpose for the action, they would be taught as its subsidiary...

analyzed: śabda mātram iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is mere sound...

analyzed: na autpattika tvāt
translated: No, because of its being innate...

analyzed: śāstram ca evam anarthakam syāt
translated: And the scripture would thus be meaningless...

analyzed: svarasya iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is of the Svaras...

analyzed: na artha abhāvāt śruteḥ asaṃbandhaḥ
translated: No, because of the absence of meaning, there is no connection with what is heard...

analyzed: svaraḥ tu utpattiṣu syāt mātrā varṇa a vibhakta tvāt
translated: But the Svaras would be in the productions, because of the non-division of the mātrās and letters...

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the indication of the Linga...

analyzed: aśruteḥ tu vikārasya uttarāsu yathāśruti
translated: But the modification is not heard in the latter, as it is heard in the former.

analyzed: śabdānām ca āsāmañjasyam
translated: And there is inconsistency in the words.

original: api tu karmaśabdaḥ syād bhāvo 'rthaḥ prasiddhagrahaṇatvād vikāro hy aviśiṣṭo 'nyaiḥ / / / /
analyzed: api tu karma śabdaḥ syāt bhāvaḥ rthaḥ prasiddha grahaṇa tvāt vikāraḥ hi a viśiṣṭaḥ nyaiḥ  /
translated: Moreover, it should be a word for action, the meaning is an entity, because of the recognition of the well-known, for the modification is not distinguished by others.

analyzed: adravyam ca api dṛśyate
translated: And it is seen even without a substance.

original: tasya ca kriyā grahaṇārthā nānārtheṣu virūpitvād artho hy āsāmalaukiko vidhānāt / / / /
analyzed: tasya ca kriyā grahaṇa arthā nānā artheṣu virūpi tvāt arthaḥ hi āsām alaukikaḥ vidhānāt
translated: And its action is for the purpose of grasping, because of the diversity in the various meanings, for the meaning of these is not worldly, because of the injunction.

analyzed: tasmin saṃjñā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ vikāra pṛthaktvāt
translated: In that, there would be specific names, because of the difference in modification.

analyzed: yoni śasyāḥ ca tulya vat itarābhiḥ vidhīyante  /
translated: And the yoni-s are enjoined like the others, equally.

analyzed: ayonau ca api dṛśyate tathā ayoni
translated: And it is seen even in a non-yoni, not as a yoni.

analyzed: aikārthye na asti vairūpyam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that there is no diversity when there is one meaning.

analyzed: syāt artha antareṣu aniṣpatteḥ yathā pāke
translated: It would be due to non-completion in other meanings, like in cooking.

analyzed: śabdānām ca sāmañjasyam
translated: And there is consistency in the words.

original: uktaṃ kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra vidhipradeśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: uktam kriyā abhidhānam tad śrutau anyatra vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt
translated: The statement of action has been stated, in the hearing of that, the injunction would be elsewhere.

analyzed: apūrve vā api bhāgi tvāt
translated: Or even in the unseen, because of the share.

analyzed: nāmnaḥ tu autpattika tvāt
translated: But the name is natural.

original: pratyakṣād guṇasaṃyogāt kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt tadabhāve 'prasiddhaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: pratyakṣāt guṇa saṃyogāt kriyā abhidhānam syāt tad abhāve prasiddham syāt
translated: The mention of the act would be due to the connection of the quality with perception, otherwise it would be unknown.

original: api vā satrakarmaṇi guṇārthaiṣā śrutiḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā satra karmaṇi guṇa arthā eṣā śrutiḥ syāt
translated: Or this text would be for the purpose of the quality in the Satra rite.

original: viśvajiti sarvapṛṣṭhe tatpūrvakatvāj jyautiṣṭomikāni pṛṣṭhāny asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ / / / /
analyzed: viśvajiti sarva pṛṣṭhe tad pūrvaka tvāt jyautiṣṭomikāni pṛṣṭhāni asti ca pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ  /
translated: In the Vishvajit with all Prsthas, because it is preceded by that, the Prsthas are Jyotishtoma, and the word Prstha is also there.

analyzed: ṣaḍahāt vā tatra hi codanā  /
translated: Or from the Shadhaha, for there is an injunction there.

analyzed: liṅgāt ca
translated: And also because of the indication.

analyzed: utpanna adhikāraḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ
translated: The Jyotishtoma is commenced after the origination.

analyzed: dvayoḥ vidhiḥ iti ced
translated: If it is argued that there is an injunction for both,

analyzed: na vyartha tvāt sarva śabdasya
translated: no, because the word all would be meaningless.

analyzed: tathā avabhṛthaḥ somāt  /
translated: Similarly, the Avabhṛtha is from the Soma.

analyzed: prakṛteḥ iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is from the archetype,

analyzed: na bhakti tvāt
translated: no, because it is a subsidiary act.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And also because of the indication of the text.

original: dravyādeśe taddravyaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt puroḍāśas tv anādeśe tatprakṛtitvāt / / / /
analyzed: dravya ādeśe tad dravyaḥ śruti saṃyogāt puroḍāśaḥ tu anādeśe tad prakṛti tvāt  /
translated: In the case of the transference of the substance, the cake belongs to that substance, because of the connection with the text. But in the case of non-transference, it belongs to the archetype, because it is of the same nature.

analyzed: guṇa vidhiḥ tu na gṛhṇīyāt sama tvāt
translated: But the injunction of a quality would not apply, because of equality.

analyzed: nirmanthya ādiṣu ca evam
translated: And so also in the case of the churning-sticks and other substances.

analyzed: praṇayanam tu saumikam a vācyam hi itarat
translated: But the bringing in is of the Soma-sacrifice, because nothing else is mentioned.

analyzed: uttaravedi pratiṣedhaḥ ca tadvat
translated: And the prohibition of the Uttaravedi is similar.

analyzed: prākṛtam vā a nāma tvāt
translated: Or it is of the archetype, because of the absence of a name.

analyzed: parisaṅkhi artham śravaṇam guṇa artha vādaḥ vā
translated: The hearing is for the purpose of restriction, or it is a praise of the qualities.

analyzed: prathama uttamayoḥ praṇayanam uttaravedi pratiṣedhāt
translated: The first and last are to be performed, because of the prohibition of the Uttaravedi.

analyzed: madhyamayoḥ vā gati arthavādāt  /
translated: Or of the middle two, because of the praise of the purpose of going.

analyzed: auttaravedikaḥ na ārabhya vāda pratiṣedhaḥ
translated: The prohibition of the Uttaravedi is not applicable to the Anārabhyāvidhi.

analyzed: svarasāma eka kapāla āmikṣam ca liṅga darśanāt  /
translated: The Svarasāman, Ekakapāla, and Amikṣā are to be performed, because of the indication of the text.

analyzed: codanā sāmānyāt vā
translated: Or because of the similarity of injunction.

analyzed: karma je karma yūpa vat
translated: In what is produced by action, the action is like the sacrificial post.

analyzed: rūpam vā aśeṣa bhūta tvāt
translated: Or the form, because of being a remainder.

analyzed: viśaye laukikaḥ syāt sarva artha tvāt  /
translated: In the case of a viśeṣa, it should be worldly, because it serves all purposes.

analyzed: na vaidikam artha nirdeśāt
translated: Not Vedic, because of the indication of the meaning.

analyzed: tathā utpattiḥ itareṣām sama tvāt
translated: Similarly, the origin of the others, because of equality.

analyzed: saṃskṛtam syāt tad śabda tvāt  /
translated: It should be refined, because of the word denoting that.

analyzed: bhaktyāḥ vā a yajña śeṣa tvāt guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt
translated: Or by devotion, because of being the remainder of the sacrifice, and because of the qualities being denoted.

analyzed: karmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭa śabdaḥ syāt tathābhūta upadeśāt
translated: The word pṛṣṭha should apply to the action, because of the teaching of that state.

original: abhidhānopadeśād vā vipratiṣedhād dravyeṣu pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: abhidhāna upadeśāt vā vipratiṣedhāt dravyeṣu pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ syāt
translated: Or because of the teaching of denotation, the word pṛṣṭha should apply to the substances, because of the contradiction.

analyzed: itikartavya tā vidheḥ yajateḥ pūrvavat tvam  /
translated: The iti-kṛtya is the prior state of the injunction of yaja.

analyzed: sa laukikaḥ syāt dṛṣṭa pravṛtti tvāt
translated: That should be worldly, because of being seen to be in use.

analyzed: vacanāt tu tatas nya tvam  /
translated: But on account of the declaration, there is difference from that...

analyzed: liṅgena vā niyamyeta liṅgasya tad guṇa tvāt
translated: Or it should be restricted by the indicative mark, because the indicative mark is of the nature of that...

analyzed: api vā a nyāya pūrva tvāt yatra nitya anuvāda vacanāni syuḥ  /
translated: Or else, where there are declarations of eternal restatements, it should be so on account of the prior reasoning...

original: mitho vipratiṣedhāc ca guṇānāṃ yathārthatalpanā syāt / / / /
analyzed: mithas vipratiṣedhāt ca guṇānām yathārtha talpanā syāt
translated: And on account of the mutual contradiction of the qualities, there should be a true combination...

original: bhāgitvāt tu niyamyeta guṇānām abhidhānatvāt sambandhād abhidhānavad yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa / / / /
analyzed: bhāgi tvāt tu niyamyeta guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt sambandhāt abhidhāna vat yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa
translated: But on account of the connection, it should be restricted, because the qualities are expressed, like the expression of the connection, as in 'the cow with the calf'...

original: utpattīnāṃ samatvād vā yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: utpattīnām sama tvāt vā yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt
translated: Or else, on account of the equality of the origins, there should be existence according to the authority...

analyzed: utpatti śeṣa vacanam ca vipratiṣiddham ekasmin
translated: And the statement about the remainder of the origin is contradictory in one...

original: vidhyanto vā prakṛtivac codanāyāṃ pravarteta tathā hi liṅgadarśanam / / / /
analyzed: vidhi antaḥ vā prakṛti vat codanāyām pravarteta tathā hi liṅga darśanam
translated: Or else, the end of the injunction should operate like the original, for such is the seen indication...

analyzed: liṅga hetu tvāt aliṅge laukikam syāt
translated: On account of being the cause of the indicative mark, in the absence of an indicative mark, it should be worldly...

original: liṅgasya pūrvavattavāc codanāśabdasāmānyād ekenāpi nirūpyeta yathā sthālīpulākena / / / /
analyzed: liṅgasya pūrvavat tavāt codanā śabda sāmānyāt ekena api nirūpyeta yathā sthālī pulākena
translated: And on account of the indicative mark being like the previous, and on account of the similarity of the word 'injunction', it should be determined by even one, as in the case of the 'stalīpulāka'...

original: dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvād aikāhikam adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavat / / / /
analyzed: dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tad prakṛti tvāt aikāhikam adhika āgamāt tad ākhyam syāt ekāha vat  /
translated: In the group of days of the Dvādaśāha, on account of its being the original, it should be of one day, on account of the addition, it should be called that, like the one-day rite...

analyzed: liṅgāt ca
translated: And on account of the indicative mark...

analyzed: na vā kratu abhidhānāt adhikānām a śabda tvam
translated: Or, because of the mention of the sacrifice, the additional ones are not enjoined by the text.

analyzed: liṅgam saṃghāta dharmaḥ syāt tad artha āpatteḥ dravya vat
translated: The indication would be a property of the aggregate, like a substance, due to the implication of that meaning.

analyzed: na vā artha dharma tvāt saṃghātasya guṇa tvāt
translated: Or, because the aggregate is a property of the meaning, it is a quality.

analyzed: artha āpatteḥ dravyeṣu dharma lābhaḥ syāt
translated: The acquisition of the property in substances would be due to implication.

analyzed: pravṛttyā niyatasya liṅga darśanam
translated: The indication of the restricted one by the engagement.

analyzed: vihāra darśanam viśiṣṭasya anārabhya vādānām prakṛti artha tavāt
translated: The observation of the enjoyment is of the distinguished one, because of the meaning of the original in the independent statements.

analyzed: atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam
translated: Now, the specific characteristics.

analyzed: yasya liṅgam artha saṃyogāt abhidhāna vat
translated: Of which the indication is due to the connection with the meaning, like the designation.

analyzed: pravṛtti tvāt iṣṭeḥ some pravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: Because of the engagement, there would be engagement in the Soma due to the desire.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And also because of the observation of the indication.

analyzed: kṛtsva vidhānāt vā apūrva tvam
translated: Or, because of the injunction of the subsidiary acts, there is novelty.

analyzed: sruc abhighāraṇa abhāvasya ca nitya anuvādāt
translated: And also because of the constant restatement of the absence of pouring over the Sruva.

analyzed: vidhiḥ iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is an injunction.

analyzed: na vākya śeṣa tvāt
translated: Or, not, because of being a supplementary passage.

analyzed: śaṅkate ca an upoṣaṇāt
translated: It doubts because of the non-fasting.

analyzed: darśanam aiṣṭikānām syāt
translated: The observation would be of the desirous ones.

analyzed: iṣṭiṣu darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: There would be engagement in the new and full moon sacrifices in the sacrifices.

analyzed: paśau ca liṅga darśanāt
translated: And also because of the observation of the indication in the animal sacrifice.

analyzed: daikṣasya ca itareṣu
translated: And also of the one for the consecration in the other ones.

analyzed: aikādaśineṣu sautyasya dvairaśanyasya darśanāt
translated: In the Ekādaśinī sacrifices, because of the mention of the Sautrāmaṇī and Dvirātra sacrifices.

analyzed: tad pravṛttiḥ gaṇeṣu syāt pratipaśu yūpa darśanāt
translated: The performance of those should be in the Gaṇas, because of the mention of the sacrificial post for each animal.

analyzed: avyaktāsu tu somasya
translated: But in the indistinct ones, of the Soma.

analyzed: gaṇeṣu dvādaśa ahasya
translated: In the Gaṇas, of the Dvādaśāha.

analyzed: gavyasya ca tad ādiṣu  /
translated: And of the Gavya, and those beginning with it.

analyzed: nikāyinām ca pūrvasya uttareṣu pravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: And of the earlier group, the performance should be in the later ones.

original: karmaṇas tv apravṛttitvāt phalaniyamakartṛ samudāyasyānanvayas tadbandhanatvāt / / / /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ tu apravṛtti tvāt phala niyama kartṛ samudāyasya ananvayaḥ tad bandhana tvāt  /
translated: But because of the non-performance of the rite, the restriction of the result is not connected with the collection of agents, because it is bound to that.

analyzed: pravṛttau ca api tādarthyāt
translated: And even in the performance, because of the purpose.

analyzed: aśruti tvāt ca
translated: And because of the absence of Vedic injunction.

original: guṇakāmeṣv āśritatvāt pravṛttiḥ syāt / / / /🔽nivṛttir vā karmabhedāt / / / /
analyzed: guṇa kāmeṣu āśrita tvāt pravṛttiḥ syāt  nivṛttiḥ vā karma bhedāt
translated: In the optional rites, the performance should be because of the dependence on the desire for the quality.🔽Or there should be cessation, because of the difference in the rites.

analyzed: api vāta dvikāra tvāt kratu artha tvāt pravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: Or rather, because of the modification of that, the performance should be because of being for the purpose of the sacrifice.

analyzed: eka karmaṇi vikalpaḥ vibhāgaḥ hi codanā ekatvāt
translated: In one rite, there is an option, because there is no division, due to the oneness of the injunction.

analyzed: liṅga sādhāraṇyāt vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: The option should be because of the commonality of the indication.

original: aikārthyād vā niyamyeta pūrvavattvād vikāro hi / / / /
analyzed: aikārthyāt vā niyamyeta pūrvavat tvāt vikāraḥ hi
translated: Or it should be restricted because of the single purpose, because the modification is like the previous one.

analyzed: aśruti tvāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it should not be because of the absence of Vedic injunction,

analyzed: syāt liṅga bhāvāt
translated: it should be because of the existence of the indication.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And the seeing of another meaning is like that.

analyzed: vipratipattau haviṣā niyamyeta karmaṇaḥ tad upākhya tvāt  /
translated: In case of conflict, the sacrifice should be regulated by the oblation, because the rite is named after that.

analyzed: tena ca karma saṃyogāt
translated: And because of the connection with the rite.

analyzed: guṇa tvena devatā śrutiḥ
translated: The mention of the deity is as a subordinate factor.

analyzed: hiraṇyam ājya dharmaḥ tejaḥ tvāt  /
translated: Gold has the properties of ghee because of its luminous nature.

analyzed: dharma anugrahāt ca
translated: And because of the favor of the properties.

analyzed: auṣadham vā viśada tvāt
translated: Or it is a medicine because of its clarity.

analyzed: caru śabdāt ca
translated: And because of the word caru.

analyzed: tasmin ca śrapaṇa śruteḥ  /
translated: And because of the mention of cooking in that.

analyzed: madhu udake dravya sāmānyāt payaḥ vikāraḥ syāt
translated: In honey and water, the modification should be of milk because of the similarity of substance.

analyzed: ājyam vā varṇa sāmānyāt
translated: Or it is ghee because of the similarity of color.

analyzed: dharma anugrahāt ca
translated: And because of the favor of the properties.

analyzed: pūrvasya ca a viśiṣṭa tvāt
translated: And because the former is not distinguished.

original: vājine somapūrvatvaṃ sautrāmaṇyāñ ca graheṣu tācchabdyāt / / / /
analyzed: vājine soma pūrva tvam sautrāmaṇyām ca graheṣu tācchabdyāt  /
translated: In the Vajapeya, the Soma comes first, and in the Sautrāmaṇī, the cups, because of the word.

analyzed: anuvaṣaṭkārac ca
translated: And because of the Vasat-utterance.

analyzed: samupahūya bhakṣaṇāt ca
translated: And because of the eating after the Samidhenis.

analyzed: krayaṇa śrapaṇa puroruc upayāma grahaṇa āsādana vāsa upanahanam ca tadvat
translated: And the buying, cooking, Puroruc, Upāmashruti, bringing, garment, and girding are like that.

analyzed: haviṣā vā niyamyeta tad vikāra tvāt
translated: Or it should be regulated by the oblation because it is a modification of that.

analyzed: praśaṃsā soma śabdaḥ  / vacanāni itarāṇi
translated: The word Soma is praise.🔽The other statements are because of the statement.

analyzed: vyapadeśaḥ ca tadvat
translated: And the designation is like that.

analyzed: paśupuroḍāśasya ca liṅga darśanam
translated: And there is an indication of the animal cake.

analyzed: paśuḥ puroḍāśa vikāraḥ syāt devatā sāmānyāt  /
translated: The animal offering would be a modification of the cake, due to the common deity.

analyzed: prokṣaṇā tat ca
translated: And that is due to sprinkling.

analyzed: paryagnikaraṇāt ca
translated: And due to the act of encircling with fire.

analyzed: sānnāyyam vā tad prabhava tvāt  /
translated: Or it is the Sannāya offering, because it originates from that.

analyzed: tasya ca pātra darśanāt  dadhnaḥ syāt mūrti sāmānyāt  /
translated: And because the vessel for it is seen.🔽It would be from curd, due to the similarity of form.

analyzed: payaḥ vā kāla sāmānyāt
translated: Or it is milk, due to the similarity of time.

analyzed: paśu ānantaryāt
translated: Due to the immediacy of the animal sacrifice.

analyzed: drava tvam ca aviśiṣṭam
translated: And the fluidity is not distinguished.

analyzed: āmikṣā ubhaya bhāvya tvāt ubhaya vikāraḥ syāt
translated: Due to being the result of both the curd and milk, it would be a modification of both.

analyzed: ekam vā codana ekatvāt  /
translated: Or it is one, due to the unity of the injunction.

analyzed: dadhi saṃghāta sāmānyāt
translated: Due to the similarity of the curd-mixture.

original: payo vā tatpradhānatvāl lokavad dadhnas tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: payaḥ vā tad pradhāna tvāt lokavat dadhnaḥ tad artha tvāt
translated: Or it is milk, because it is primary, like in the world, because the curd is for that purpose.

analyzed: dharma anugrahāt ca
translated: And due to the favor of the dharma.

original: satramahīnaś ca dvādaśāhas tasyobhayathā pravṛttir aikakarmyāt / / / /
analyzed: satramahīnaḥ ca dvādaśa ahaḥ tasya ubhayathā pravṛttiḥ aikakarmyāt
translated: And the twelve-day Satra-Ahina, its operation is in both ways, due to the unity of the ritual.

original: api vā yajatiśruter ahīnabhūtapravṛttiḥ syāt prakṛtyā tulya śabdatvāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā yajati śruteḥ ahīna bhūta pravṛttiḥ syāt prakṛtyā
translated: Or, due to the statement of sacrifice, the operation of the Ahina would be, because the word is the same as the archetype.

analyzed: dvirātra ādīnām ekādaśa rātrāt ahīna tvam yajati codanāt  /
translated: Of the two-night etc., the Ahina-ness is from the eleven-night etc., due to the injunction of sacrifice.

analyzed: trayodaśa rātra ādiṣu satra bhūtaḥ teṣu āsana upāyi codanāt  /
translated: In the thirteen-night etc., the Ahina is in the form of a Satra, due to the injunction of sitting and obtaining.

analyzed: liṅgāt ca
translated: And due to the indication.

original: anyatarato 'tirātratvāt pañcadaśarātrasyāhīnatvaṃ kuṇḍapāyināmayanasya ca tadbhūteṣv ahīnatvasya darśanāt / / / /
analyzed: anyataratas tirātra tvāt pañcadaśa rātrasya ahīna tvam kuṇḍapāyinām ayanasya ca tad bhūteṣu ahīna tvasya darśanāt  /
translated: Because of the Atiratra on one side, the Pañcadaśarātra is a complete sacrifice, and because of the fact that the Ahīna nature is seen in the Ahīna sacrifices included in the Kuṇḍapāyinām Ayana.

analyzed: ahīna vacanāt ca
translated: And because of the statement about the Ahīna.

analyzed: satre vā upāyi codanāt  /
translated: And because of the injunction in the Satra.

analyzed: satra liṅgam ca darśayati
translated: And it shows the mark of the Satra.

analyzed: haviḥ gaṇe param uttarasya deśa sāmānyāt
translated: And in the group of oblations, because of the common place of the last and the next,

analyzed: devatayā vā niyamyeta śabda tvāt itarasya a śruti tvāt
translated: Or it should be restricted by the deity, because of the word, and because the other is not heard.

analyzed: gaṇa codanāyām yasya liṅgam tad āvṛttiḥ pratīyeta āgneya vat
translated: In the injunction of the group, the repetition of that should be understood by whose mark, like the one for Agni.

analyzed: nānā ahāni vā saṃghāta tvāt pravṛtti liṅgena codanāt
translated: Or the different days, because of the collection, and because of the injunction by the mark of the activity.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And the seeing of another meaning is like that.

analyzed: kāla abhyāse pi bādariḥ karma bhedāt  /
translated: Bādarāyaṇa says that even in the repetition of time, it is a different rite because of the difference in the rites.

analyzed: tad āvṛttim tu jaiminiḥ ahnām a pratyakṣa saṃkhya tvāt
translated: But Jaimini says that it is the repetition of that, because the days are not directly numbered.

analyzed: saṃsthā gaṇeṣu tad abhyāsaḥ pratīyeta kṛta lakṣaṇa grahaṇāt
translated: In the groups of Saṃsthās, that repetition should be understood, because of the taking of the defined characteristics.

original: adhikārād vā prakṛtis tadviśiṣṭā syād abhidhānasya tannimittatvāt / / / /
analyzed: adhikārāt vā prakṛtiḥ tad viśiṣṭā syāt abhidhānasya tad nimitta tvāt
translated: Or by the authority, the archetype would be distinguished by that, because the designation is for that purpose.

analyzed: gaṇāt upacayaḥ tad prakṛti tvāt
translated: The increase is from the group, because of its being the archetype.

analyzed: ekāhāt vā teṣām sama tvāt syāt  /
translated: Or they are equal to one day, because of their equality.

original: gāyatrīṣu prākṛtīnām avacchedaḥ prakṛtyādhikārāt saṃkhyātvād agniṣṭomavad avyatirekāt tadākhyatvam / / / /
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu prākṛtīnām avacchedaḥ prakṛtyā adhikārāt saṃkhyā tvāt agniṣṭoma vat avyatirekāt tad ākhya tvam  /
translated: In the Gāyatrī verses, the original ones are limited, because of the authority of the original, because of the nature of number, like the Agniṣṭoma, because of non-difference, the name is due to that.

analyzed: tat nitya vat ca prathak satīṣu tad vacanam
translated: And that is stated separately in the eternal ones.

analyzed: na viṃśatau daśa iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not in the twenty or ten,

analyzed: aikasaṃkhyam eva syāt
translated: it should be of the same number.

analyzed: guṇāt vā dravya śabdaḥ syāt a sarva viṣaya tvāt
translated: Or it should be a word for substance due to a quality, because it is not all-inclusive.

analyzed: go tva vat ca samanvayaḥ  saṃkhyāyāḥ ca śabda tvāt
translated: And like cowness, there is inclusion.🔽And because number is a word.

analyzed: itarasya aśruti tvāt ca
translated: And because the other is not heard.

analyzed: dravya antare niveśāt ukthya lopaiḥ viśiṣṭam syāt
translated: Because it is not included in another substance, it should be distinguished by the omissions of the Ukthya.

analyzed: a śāstra lakṣaṇa tvāt ca
translated: And because it is not the characteristic of the scriptures.

analyzed: utpatti nāmadheya tvāt pṛthak satīṣu syāt
translated: And because of being the name of the origin, it should be separate in the Pṛthaksatīs by the rule.

analyzed: vacanam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is a statement,

original: yāvad uktam / / / /🔽apūrve ca vikalpaḥ syād yadi saṃkhyāvidhānam / / / /
analyzed: yāvat uktam  apūrve ca vikalpaḥ syāt yadi saṃkhyā vidhānam
translated: it is as much as has been said.🔽And in the unseen, there would be an option if the number is prescribed.

analyzed: ṛk guṇa tvāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not due to the quality of the Ṛc,

analyzed: tathā pūrvavati syāt
translated: it should be so in the previous one.

analyzed: guṇa āveśaḥ ca sarvatra
translated: And the inclusion of qualities is everywhere.

analyzed: niṣpanna grahaṇāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not due to the mention of the accomplished,

analyzed: tathā iha apisyāt
translated: So it would be here too.

original: yadi vāviśaye niyamaḥ prakṛtyupabandhāc chareṣv api prasiddhaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: yadi vā aviśaye niyamaḥ prakṛti upabandhāt śareṣu api prasiddhaḥ syāt
translated: Or if there is a restriction on the object, it would be well-known in the case of arrows also due to the connection with the original.

analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the application is seen,

analyzed: tathā śareṣu api
translated: then it would be the same in the case of arrows also.

analyzed: bhattayā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is for the sake of the fee,

analyzed: tathā itarasmin  /
translated: then it would be the same in the other case also.

original: arthasya cāsamāptatvān na tāsām ekadeśe syāt / / / /
analyzed: arthasya ca a samāpta tvāt na tāsām eka deśe syāt  /
translated: And because the purpose is not completed, it would not be in a part of them.

analyzed: darvi homaḥ yajña abhidhānam homa saṃyogāt
translated: The darvihoma is the designation of the sacrifice due to the connection with the homa.

analyzed: sa laukikānām syāt kartuḥ tad ākhya tvāt  /
translated: It would be for the worldly ones, because the performer is called by that name.

analyzed: sarveṣām vā darśanāt vāstu home  /
translated: Or for all, because of the seeing in the vastuhoma.

analyzed: juhoti codanānām vā tad saṃyogāt
translated: Or because of the connection with the injunctions of juhoti.

analyzed: dravya upadeśāt vā guṇa abhidhānam syāt
translated: Or the mention of the quality would be due to the instruction of the substance.

analyzed: na laukikānām ācāra grahaṇa tvāt śabdavatām ca anya artha vidhānāt
translated: Not for the worldly ones, because of the grasping of the conduct, and because of the injunction of another meaning for those with words.

analyzed: darśanāt ca anya pātrasya
translated: And because of the seeing of another vessel.

analyzed: tathā agni haviṣoḥ
translated: Similarly for the fire and the oblation.

analyzed: uktaḥ ca artha sambandhaḥ
translated: And the connection with the meaning has been stated.

analyzed: tasmin somaḥ pravarteta avyakta tvāt
translated: In that, the soma would be used, because of its indistinctness.

original: na vā svāhākāreṇa saṃyogād vāṣaṭkārasya ca nirdeśāt tantretena vipratiṣedhāt / / / /
analyzed: na vā svāhākāreṇa saṃyogāt vāṣaṭkārasya ca nirdeśāt tantra itena vipratiṣedhāt
translated: Or not, because of the connection with the svāhā utterance, and because of the direction of the vaṣaṭkāra, by that there is a contradiction in the tantra.

analyzed: śabda antara tvāt
translated: Because of the difference in the words.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the indication of a mark.

original: uttarārthas tu svāhākāro yathā sāptadaśyaṃ tatrāvipratiṣiddhā punaḥ pravṛttir liṅgadarśanāt paśuvat / / / /
analyzed: uttara arthaḥ tu svāhākāraḥ yathā sāptadaśyam tatra a vipratiṣiddhā punar pravṛttiḥ liṅga darśanāt paśu vat  /
translated: But the Svâhâ exclamation is for the sake of the subsequent (act), just as the Saptadaça (stoma) is; the repetition there is not prohibited, because of the indication of a mark, like in the case of an animal.

original: anuttarārtho vārthavattvād ānarthakyād dhi prākṛtasyoparodhaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: an uttara arthaḥ vā arthavat tvāt ānarthakyāt hi prākṛtasya uparodhaḥ syāt
translated: Or it is not for the sake of the subsequent (act), because of the sensefulness (of the Svâhâ), for there would be an obstruction of the original (act) by the uselessness (of the Svâhâ).

original: na prakṛtāv apīti cet / / / /🔽uktaṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyam / / / /
analyzed: na prakṛtau api iti ced  uktam samavāye pāra daurbalyam
translated: If it be said that (the Svâhâ) is not even in the original (act),🔽It has been said that in a combination the later (act) is weaker.

analyzed: tad codanā vā iṣṭeḥ pravṛtti tvāt vidhiḥ syāt
translated: The injunction is a command, because of the engagement (of the Svâhâ),

analyzed: śabda sāmarthyāt ca
translated: And because of the capability of the word.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the indication of a mark.

analyzed: tatra abhāvasya hetu tvāt guṇa arthe syāt adarśanam
translated: And because of the non-perception in the case of the absence being the cause, it would be in the sense of a quality.

analyzed: vidhiḥ iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is an injunction,

original: na vākyaśeṣatvād guṇārthe ca samādhānaṃ nānātvenopapadyate / / / /
analyzed: na vākya śeṣa tvāt guṇa arthe ca samādhānam nānātvena upapadyate
translated: No, because of being a supplement, and the arrangement in the sense of a quality is possible by difference.

original: yeṣāṃ vāparayor hemas teṣāṃ syād avirodhāt / / / /
analyzed: yeṣām vā aparayoḥ hemaḥ teṣām syāt avirodhāt
translated: Or in the case of those for whom the gold is in the other two, it would be, because of non-contradiction.

analyzed: tatra auṣadhāni codyante tāni sthānena gamyeran
translated: There the medicines are enjoined, they would be understood by the place.

analyzed: liṅgāt vā śeṣa homayoḥ  /
translated: Or by the mark, in the case of the remaining oblations.

original: pratipatti tu te bhavatas tasmād atādvikāratvam / / / /
analyzed: tu te bhavataḥ tasmāt a tād vikāra tvam
translated: But they are the means of attainment, therefore there is no modification of that.

original: sannipāte virodhinām apravṛttiḥ pratīyeta vidhyutpattivyavasthānād arthasyāpariṇeyatvād vacanād atideśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: sannipāte virodhinām apravṛttiḥ pratīyeta vidhi utpatti vyavasthānāt arthasya apariṇeya tvāt vacanāt atideśaḥ syāt  /
translated: In the case of conflicting injunctions, the non-operation of one would be understood due to the establishment of the origin of the injunction, or due to the non-transference of the meaning, there would be extension by the statement.

original: yajñakarma pradhānaṃ tad dhi codanābhūtaṃ tasya dravyeṣu saṃskāras tatprayuktas tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: yajña karma pradhānam tat hi codanā bhūtam tasya dravyeṣu saṃskāraḥ tad prayuktaḥ tad artha tvāt  /
translated: The sacrificial rite is primary, because it is the injunction. The consecration of the substances in it is employed for that purpose, because it serves that purpose.

analyzed: saṃskāre yujyamānānām tādarthyāt tat prayuktam syāt
translated: Of those employed in consecration, it would be employed for that purpose, because it serves that purpose.

original: tena tvarthena yajñasya saṃyogād dharmasambandhas tasmād yajñaprayuktaṃ syāt saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: tena tu arthena yajñasya saṃyogāt dharma sambandhaḥ tasmāt yajña prayuktam syāt saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt  /
translated: However, due to the connection of the sacrifice with that purpose, there is a connection with dharma. Therefore, it would be employed in the sacrifice, because the consecration serves that purpose.

analyzed: phala devatayoḥ ca
translated: And of the result and the deity.

analyzed: na codanātī hi tādguṇyam
translated: For what is not enjoined, there is no similarity.

original: devatā vā prayojayed atithivad bhojanasya tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: devatāḥ vā prayojayet atithi vat bhojanasya tad artha tvāt  /
translated: Or the deity would employ it, like a guest, because the meal serves that purpose.

analyzed: artha apatyā ca
translated: And by presumption.

analyzed: tatas ca tena sambandhaḥ
translated: And therefore, there is a connection with that.

original: api vā śabdapūrvatvād yajñakarma pradhānaṃ syād guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ / / / /
analyzed: api vā śabda pūrva tvāt yajña karma pradhānam syāt guṇa tve devatā śrutiḥ  /
translated: Or, because of the precedence of the word, the sacrificial rite would be primary. In the case of being a secondary factor, the mention of the deity.

original: atithau tatpradhānatvam abhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt tasya prītipradhānatvāt / / / /
analyzed: atithau tad pradhāna tvam abhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt tasya prīti pradhāna tvāt
translated: In the guest, that is primary. The absence would be in the rite, because it is primary in the satisfaction of that.

analyzed: dravya saṃkhyā hetu samudāyam vā śruti saṃyogāt
translated: Or the collection of substance, number, cause, is due to the connection with the Veda.

original: arthakārite ca dravyeṇa na vyavasthā syāt / / / /
analyzed: artha kārite ca dravyeṇa na vyavasthā syāt
translated: And in the case of a substance that performs a purpose, there would be no restriction by the substance.

original: artho vā syāt prayojanam itareṣām acodanāt tasya ca guṇabhūtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: arthaḥ vā syāt prayojanam itareṣām a codanāt tasya ca guṇa bhūta tvāt
translated: Or it may be the purpose, because the others are not enjoined, and that is subordinate.

analyzed: apūrva tvāt vyavasthā syāt
translated: There would be restriction due to the unseen nature.

analyzed: tad prayukta tve ca dharmasya sarva viṣaya tvam
translated: And if it is employed, then Dharma would apply to all objects.

analyzed: tad yuktasya iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is connected with that,

analyzed: na a śruti tvāt
translated: it is not so, because it is not stated.

analyzed: adhikārāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is due to eligibility,

original: tulyeṣu nādhikāraḥ syād acoditaś ca sambandhaḥ pṛthaksatāṃ yajñārthenābhisambandhas tasmādyajñaprayojanam / / / /
analyzed: tulyeṣu na adhikāraḥ syāt a coditaḥ ca sambandhaḥ pṛthak satām yajña arthena abhisambandhaḥ tasmāt yajña prayojanam  /
translated: there would be no eligibility in similar cases, and the connection is not stated. The connection of the existing ones is for the purpose of sacrifice, therefore it serves the purpose of the sacrifice.

original: deśabaddham upāṃśutvaṃ teṣāṃ syāc chrutinirdeśāt tasya ca tatrabhāvāt / / / /
analyzed: deśa baddham upāṃśu tvam teṣām syāt śruti nirdeśāt tasya ca tatrabhāvāt
translated: The quality of being whispered is bound to the place, because of the Vedic injunction, and because it exists there.

analyzed: yajñasya vā tad saṃyogāt
translated: Or it belongs to the sacrifice, because of its connection with that.

analyzed: anuvādaḥ ca tad artha vat
translated: And it is a restatement, like that which has the same purpose.

analyzed: praṇītā ādi tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the Praṇītā and others are similar,

analyzed: na yajñasya aśruti tvāt
translated: it is not so, because the sacrifice is not stated.

analyzed: tad deśānām vā saṃghātasya codita tvāt
translated: Or because the collection of those places is stated.

analyzed: agni dharmaḥ prati iṣṭakam saṃghātāt paurṇamāsī vat
translated: The property of the fire is at each layer, because of the collection, like the full moon sacrifice.

original: agner vā syād dravyaikatvād itarāsāṃ tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: agneḥ vā syāt dravya ekatvāt itarāsām tad artha tvāt
translated: It may be of Agni, because of the oneness of the substance, and of the others because of their purpose.

analyzed: codanā samudāyāt tu paurṇamāsyām tathā syāt
translated: But on the full moon day, it should be so because of the collection of injunctions.

analyzed: patnīsaṃyāja anta tvam sarveṣām aviśeṣāt
translated: The end with the Patnīsaṃyājas is of all without distinction.

analyzed: liṅgāt vā prāk uttamāt  /
translated: Or, before the highest, because of the indication.

original: anuvādo vā dīkṣā yathā naktaṃ saṃsthāpanasya / / / /🔽syād vānārabhya vidhānād ante liṅga virodhāt / / / /
analyzed: anuvādaḥ vā dīkṣā yathā naktam saṃsthāpanasya  syāt vā an ārabhya vidhānāt ante liṅga virodhāt  /
translated: Or it is a restatement, like the night of the consecration of the installation.🔽Or it may be at the end because of the connection with the beginning, due to the contradiction of the indication.

analyzed: abhyāsaḥ sāmidhenīnām prāthamyāt sthāna dharmaḥ syāt
translated: The repetition of the Sāmidhenī verses is a property of the place because of the primacy.

analyzed: iṣṭi āvṛtau prayāja vat āvarteta ārambhaṇīyā
translated: Like the Prayājas, the Ārambhaṇīyā should be repeated in the two Iṣṭis.

analyzed: sakṛt vā ārambha saṃyogāt ekaḥ punarārambhaḥ yāvat jīva prayogāt
translated: Or once, because of the connection with the beginning, the repetition is once, due to the application throughout life.

original: arthābhidhānasaṃyogān mantreṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ syāt tatrācoditam aprāptaṃ coditābhidhānāt / / / /
analyzed: artha abhidhāna saṃyogāt mantreṣu śeṣa bhāvaḥ syāt tatra a coditam a prāptam codita abhidhānāt  /
translated: In the mantras, the subsidiary nature would be due to the connection with the expression of meaning, and there the unstated and the unattained are stated due to the statement.

analyzed: tatas ca avacanam teṣām itara artham prayujyate
translated: And therefore, their non-statement is employed for another purpose.

analyzed: guṇa śabdaḥ tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the word denoting a quality is so,

analyzed: na samavāyāt
translated: no, because of the inherence.

analyzed: codite tu parārtha tvāt vidhivat avikāraḥ syāt
translated: But when enjoined, because of being for another purpose, there would be no modification like an injunction.

analyzed: vikāraḥ tad pradhāne syāt
translated: The modification would be in what is primary for that.

analyzed: asaṃyogāt tad artheṣu tat viśiṣṭam pratīyeta
translated: Because of non-connection with those meanings, it would be understood as qualified by that.

analyzed: karma abhāvāt evam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is so because of the absence of action,

analyzed: na parārtha tvāt
translated: No, because it serves another's purpose.

analyzed: liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt samāna vidhāneṣu aprāptā sārasvatī strī tvāt  /
translated: Because of the indication of a specific gender, the Sarasvati, which is not obtained in the injunctions of the same kind, is due to being feminine.

original: paśvabhidhānād vā tad dhi codanābhūtaṃ puṃviṣayaṃ punaḥ paśutvam / / / /
analyzed: paśu abhidhānāt vā tat hi codanā bhūtam pum viṣayam punar paśu tvam
translated: Or because of the mention of an animal, that which is in the form of an injunction is again the state of being an animal with reference to a male.

analyzed: viśeṣaḥ vā tad artha nirdeśāt
translated: Or there is a distinction because of the indication of its purpose.

analyzed: paśu tvam ca aikaśabdyāt
translated: And the state of being an animal is due to the same word.

analyzed: yathā uktam vā sannidhānāt
translated: Or it is as stated because of proximity.

original: āmnātād anyad adhikāre vacanād vikāraḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: āmnātāt anyat adhikāre vacanāt vikāraḥ syāt
translated: In the case of one who is enjoined other than what is mentioned, there would be a modification due to the statement.

original: dvaidhaṃ vā tulyahetutvāt sāmānyād vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: dvaidham vā tulya hetu tvāt sāmānyāt vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: Or there would be a twofold option due to the equality of reasons, because of the general rule.

original: upadeśāc ca sāmnaḥ / / / /🔽niyamo vā śrutiviśeṣād itarat sāptadaśyavat / / / /
analyzed: upadeśāt ca sāmnaḥ  niyamaḥ vā śruti viśeṣāt itarat sāptadaśya vat
translated: And because of the instruction of the Saman.🔽Or there would be a restriction due to the specific Vedic text, the other being like the Saptadaśa.

analyzed: a pragāṇāt śabda anya tve tathābhūta upadeśaḥ syāt
translated: Or in the case of the word being different, there would be an instruction of that nature due to the absence of the Pragana.

analyzed: yad sthāne vā tat gītiḥ syāt pada anya tva pradhāna tvāt
translated: Or in the place of that, there would be the singing, because of the primacy of the difference in words.

analyzed: gāna saṃyogāt ca
translated: And because of the connection with singing.

analyzed: vacanam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is a statement,

analyzed: na tad pradhāna tvāt
translated: No, because of its primacy.

analyzed: sāmāni mantram eke smṛti upadeśābhyām
translated: The Samans are mantras according to some, by the teachings of memory.

analyzed: tad ukta doṣam
translated: The fault stated in that is...

analyzed: karma vā vidhi lakṣaṇam
translated: Or the rite is characterized by injunction.

analyzed: tādṛś dravyam vacanāt pākayajña vat
translated: Such a substance is by the statement, like in a Paakayajna.

analyzed: tatra a vipratiṣiddhaḥ dravya antare vyatirekaḥ pradeśaḥ ca
translated: There is no contradiction in another substance, and there is a division.

analyzed: śabda artha tvāt tu na evam syāt
translated: But it should not be so because of the meaning of the word.

analyzed: parārtha tvāt ca śabdānām
translated: And because of the purpose of the words.

analyzed: asambandhaḥ ca karmaṇā śabdayoḥ pṛthak artha tvāt
translated: And there is no connection between the word and the rite because of the separate meaning.

analyzed: saṃskāraḥ ca a prakaraṇe gni vat syāt prayukta tvāt
translated: And the refinement would be in the absence of the context, like in the fire, because of the use.

analyzed: akārya tvāt ca śabdānām aprayogaḥ pratīyeta  /
translated: And because of the non-action of the words, the non-use would be understood.

analyzed: āśrita tvāt ca
translated: And because of the dependence.

analyzed: prayujyate iti ced
translated: If it is said that it is used,

analyzed: grahaṇa artham prayujyeta
translated: it would be used for the purpose of grasping.

analyzed: tṛce syāt śruti nirdeśāt
translated: In the three, it would be due to the direction of the scripture.

analyzed: śabda artha tvāt vikārasya
translated: Because of the meaning of the word, of the modification.

analyzed: darśayati ca
translated: And it shows.

original: vākyānāṃ tu vibhaktatvāt pratiśabdaṃ samāptiḥ syāt saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt / / / /🔽tathā cānyārtha darśanam / / / /
analyzed: vākyānām tu vibhakta tvāt pratiśabdam samāptiḥ syāt saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt  tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: But because of the division of the sentences, the completion would be for each word, because of the purpose of the refinement.🔽And the seeing of another meaning is like that.

analyzed: an avāna upadeśaḥ ca tadvat
translated: And the teaching of the non-new is like that.

analyzed: abhyāsena itarā śrutiḥ
translated: The other text is due to repetition.

analyzed: tad abhyāsaḥ samāsu syāt
translated: That repetition would be in the Sāmans.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca  naimittikam tu uttarā tvam ānantaryāt pratīyeta

analyzed: aikārthyāt ca tad abhyāsaḥ

analyzed: prāgāthikam tu  sve ca

analyzed: pragāthe ca

analyzed: liṅga darśana a vyatiretakāt ca

analyzed: artha ekatvāt vikalpaḥ syāt

analyzed: artha ekatvāt vikalpaḥ syāt ṛk sāmayoḥ tad artha tvāt

analyzed: vacanāt viniyogaḥ syāt

analyzed: sāma pradeśe vikāraḥ tad apekṣaḥ syāt śāstra kṛ tvāt  /

analyzed: varṇe tu vādariḥ yathādravyam dravya vyatirekāt

analyzed: stobhasya eke dravya antare nivṛttim ṛk vat

original: sarvātideśas tu sāmānyāl lokavad vikāraḥ syāt / / / /

analyzed: nivṛttiḥ vā artha lopāt

analyzed: anvayaḥ vā arthavādaḥ syāt

translated: And Jaimini says that the additional and the indistinct are due to the word Stobha.

analyzed: dharmasya artha kṛta tvāt dravya guṇa vikāra vyatikrama pratiṣedhe codanā anubandhaḥ samavāyāt  /

analyzed: tad utpatteḥ tu nivṛttiḥ tad kṛta tvāt syāt

analyzed: aveśyeran vā arthavat tvāt saṃrakārasya tad artha tvāt

original: ākhyā caivaṃ tadāveśād vikṛtau syād apūrvatvāt / / / /🔽parārthena tv arthasāmānyaṃ saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: ākhyā ca evam tad āveśāt vikṛtau syāt apūrva tvāt  para arthena tu artha sāmānyam saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt  /

analyzed: kriyeran vā artha nirvṛtteḥ
translated: They should be performed, because of the completion of the purpose.

analyzed: eka artha tvāt avibhāgaḥ syāt

analyzed: nirdeśāt vā vyavatiṣṭheran

analyzed: aprākṛte tad vikārāt virodhāt yavatiṣṭheran

analyzed: ubhayasāmni ca evam eka artha āpatteḥ

analyzed: sva artha tvāt vā vyavasthā syāt prakṛti vat

analyzed: kālasya iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is because of the time,

analyzed: na a prakaraṇa tvāt
translated: no, because it is not a context.

analyzed: mantra varṇāt ca
translated: And also because of the mantra text.

analyzed: tad abhāve gni vat iti ced

analyzed: na ādhikāraka tvāt

analyzed: ubhayoḥ aviśeṣāt
translated: Because there is no difference between the two...

analyzed: yad abhījyā vā tad viṣayau

analyzed: prayāje pi iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is also in the Prayāja...

analyzed: na a codita tvāt

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca

analyzed: jāti naimittikam yathāsthānam
translated: The jāti and naimittika are in their proper place...

analyzed: avikāram eke na ārṣa tvāt

analyzed: liṅga dakśanāt ca

analyzed: nikāraḥ vāta dukta hetuḥ

analyzed: liṅgam mantra cikīrṣā artham

analyzed: niyamaḥ vā ubhaya bhāgi tvāt  /

analyzed: laukike doṣa saṃyogāt apavṛkte hi codyate nimittena prakṛtau syāt a bhāgi tvāt  /

original: anyāyas tv avikāreṇā draṣṭapratighātitvād aviśeṣāc ca tenāsya / / / /
analyzed: anyāyaḥ tu avikāreṇa ā draṣṭa pratighāti tvāt aviśeṣāt ca tena asya

analyzed: yathārtham tu anyāyasya a codita tvāt

analyzed: chandasi tu yathādṛṣṭam

original: vipratipattau vikalpaḥ syāt tatsatvād guṇe tv anyāyakalpanaikadeśatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vipratipattau vikalpaḥ syāt tad satvāt guṇe tu anyāya kalpanā eka deśa tvāt

analyzed: prakaraṇa viśeṣāt ca

original: arthābhāvāt tu naivaṃ syād guṇamātram itarat / / / /

analyzed: na utpatti śabda tvāt

analyzed: apūrve tu a vikāraḥ pradeśāt pratīyeta  /

analyzed: vikṛtau ca api tad vacanāt

analyzed: adhriguḥ savanīyeṣu tadvat samāna vidhānāḥ ced
translated: And adhrigu in the savanīya offerings; if the same injunction.

original: pratinidhau cāvikārāt / / / /🔽anāmnānād aśabdatvam abhāvāc cetarasya syāt / / / /

analyzed: uktam ca tattvam asya
translated: And the truth of this has been stated.

analyzed: saṃsargiṣu ca arthasya asthita parimāṇa tvāt

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And also because of the seeing of the mark.

analyzed: ekadhā iti eka saṃyogāt abhyāsena abhidhānam syāt

analyzed: avikāraḥ vā bahūnām eka karma vat
translated: Or there would be no modification of many, like one action.

original: sakṛttvaṃ caikadhyaṃ syād ekatvāt tvaco 'nabhipretaṃ tatprakṛtitvāt pareṣv abhyāsena vivṛddhāv abhidhānāṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: sakṛttvam ca aikadhyam syāt eka tvāt tvacaḥ na abhipretam tad prakṛti tvāt pareṣu abhyāsena vivṛddhau abhidhānām syāt  /
translated: And oneness would be unity, because of the oneness of the skin, that is not intended, because of its being the original, in the others, by repetition, in the increase, there would be the declaration.

original: medhapatitvaṃ svāmidevatasya samavāyāt sarvatra ca prayuktatvāt tasyācānyāyanigadatvāt sarvatraivāvikāraḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: medha pati tvam svāmi devatasya samavāyāt sarvatra ca prayukta tvāt sarvatra eva a vikāraḥ syāt  /
translated: The state of being the lord's wife is due to the combination, and because it is used everywhere, because of the non-contradictory statement, everywhere there would be no modification.

original: api vā dvisamavāyo 'rthānyatve yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prayogaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā dvi samavāyaḥ ṛtha anya tve yathāsaṃkhyam prayogaḥ syāt
translated: Or, in the case of the difference of meaning, there would be application according to the number, due to the twofold combination.

original: svāmino vaikaśabdyād utkarṣo devatāyāṃ syāt patnyāṃ dvitīyaśabdaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: svāminaḥ vā aikaśabdyāt utkarṣaḥ devatāyām syāt patnyām dvitīya śabdaḥ syāt

original: devatā tu tadāśīṣṭvāt samprāptatvāt svāminy anarthikā syāt / / / /
analyzed: devatā tu tad āśīḥ tvāt samprāpta tvāt svāminī anarthikā syāt

original: utsargāc ca bhaktyā tasmin patitvaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: utsargāt ca bhaktyā tasmin pati tvam syāt
translated: And due to the general rule, the state of being the wife would be by devotion in him.

analyzed: utkṛṣyeta eka saṃyuktaḥ dvi devate sambhavāt

analyzed: ekaḥ tu samavāyāt tasya tad lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: saṃsargitvāc ca tasmāt tena vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: saṃsargi tvāt ca tasmāt tena vikalpaḥ syāt  /

analyzed: eka tve api guṇa anapāyāt
translated: Even in oneness, due to the non-abandonment of the qualities.

analyzed: niyamaḥ bahu devate vikāraḥ syāt
translated: In the case of many deities, there would be modification due to the rule.

analyzed: vikalpaḥ vā prakṛti vat

original: arthāntare vikāraḥ syād devatāpṛthaktvād ekābhisamavāyāt syāt / / / /
analyzed: artha antare vikāraḥ syāt devatā pṛthaktvāt eka abhisamavāyāt syāt
translated: In another meaning, there would be modification, because of the separateness of the deity, and because of the unity.

original: ṣaḍviṃśatir abhyāsena paśugaṇe tatprakṛtitvād gaṇasya pravibhaktatvād avikāre hi tāsām akārtsnyenābhisambandho vikārān na samāsaḥ syād asaṃyogāc
analyzed: ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ abhyāsena paśu gaṇe tad prakṛti tvāt gaṇasya pravibhakta tvāt avikāre hi tāsām akārtsnyena abhisambandhaḥ vikārāt na samāsaḥ syāt asaṃyogāt
translated: Twenty-six by repetition in the group of animals, because of their being of the same nature, because of the division of the group, for in modification, their connection is not complete, and because of non-combination with the modifications.

analyzed: ca sarvābhiḥ
translated: And because of non-connection with all.

analyzed: abhyāse pi tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is the same even in repetition,

analyzed: na guṇāt artha kṛta tvāt ca
translated: no, because of the quality, and because of being done for the sake of the object.

analyzed: samāse pi tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is the same even in combination,

analyzed: na asambhavāt
translated: no, because of impossibility.

original: svābhiś ca vacanaṃ prakṛtau tatheha syāt / / / /
analyzed: svābhiḥ ca vacanam prakṛtau tathā iha syāt
translated: And because of the statement with their own in the original, it should be so here.

original: vaṅkrīṇāṃ tu pradhānatvāt samāsenābhidhānaṃ syāt prādhānyam adhrigos tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vaṅkrīṇām tu pradhāna tvāt samāsena abhidhānam syāt prādhānyam adhrigoḥ tad artha tvāt  /
translated: But because of the primacy of the crooked ones, there would be designation by combination, the primacy is of the one who goes on the altar, because of its being for that purpose.

analyzed: tāsām ca kṛtsna vacanāt  /
translated: And because of the complete statement of them.

original: api tv asannipātitvāt patnīvad āmnātenābhidhānaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api tu a sannipāti tvāt patnī vat āmnātena abhidhānam syāt  /

analyzed: vikāraḥ tu pradeśa tvāt yajamāna vat
translated: But because of being a part, there is modification, like the sacrificer.

analyzed: apūrva tvāt tathā patnyām
translated: And because of being unprecedented, it is the same in the wife.

analyzed: an āmnātaḥ tu a vikārāt saṅkhyāsu sarva gāmi tvāt  /
translated: But because of non-statement, because of non-modification, because of going everywhere in the numbers.

original: saṅkhāyā tv evaṃ pradhānaṃ syād vaṅkrayaḥ punaḥ pradhānam / / / /
analyzed: saṅkhāyā tu evam pradhānam syāt vaṅkrayaḥ punar pradhānam

original: anāmnātavacanam avacanena hi vaṅkrīṇāṃ syān nirdeśaḥ / / / /

analyzed: abhyāsaḥ vā a vikārāt syāt

original: paśus tv evaṃ prādhānaṃ syād abhyāsasya tannimittatvāt tasmāt samāsaśabdaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: paśuḥ tu evam prādhānam syāt abhyāsasya tad nimitta tvāt tasmāt samāsa śabdaḥ syāt  /
