original: vikṛtau prākṛtasya vidher grahaṇāt punaḥ śrutir anarthikā syāt / / / /
analyzed: vikṛtau prākṛtasya vidheḥ grahaṇāt punar śrutiḥ anarthikā syāt
translated: In the modified ritual, because of the inclusion of the enjoined original, the repetition would be meaningless.

analyzed: api vā āgneya vat dvi śabda tvam syāt
translated: Or like the Agnihotra, there would be a twofold word.

analyzed: na vā śabda pṛthaktvāt
translated: Or not, because of the separation of the words.

original: adhikaṃ vārthavattvāt syād arthavādaguṇābhāve vacanād avikāre teṣu hi tādarthyaṃ syād apūrvatvāt / / / /
analyzed: adhikam vā arthavat tvāt syāt arthavāda guṇa abhāve vacanāt avikāre teṣu hi tādarthyam syāt apūrva tvāt  /
translated: It would be more, because of the purposefulness. In the absence of the qualities of arthavada, there would be no modification due to the statement. For in them, there would be the purpose of that, because of being unprecedented.

analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ syāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that there would be a prohibition,

analyzed: na a śruta tvāt
translated: no, because of not being heard.

analyzed: agrahaṇāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not grasped,

analyzed: na tulya tvāt
translated: no, because of similarity.

analyzed: tathā tad grahaṇe syāt
translated: In that way, there would be the grasping of that.

analyzed: apūrva tām tu darśayet grahaṇasya arthavat tvāt
translated: But it would show the unprecedented nature, because of the purposefulness of the grasping.

analyzed: tatas pi yāvat uktam syāt
translated: Then also, it would be as much as stated.

original: sviṣṭakṛdbhakṣapratiṣedhaḥ syāt tulyakāraṇatvāt / / / /🔽atiṣedho vā darśanād iḍāyāṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: sviṣṭakṛt bhakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tulya kāraṇa tvāt  atiṣedhaḥ vā darśanāt iḍāyām syāt
translated: There would be a prohibition of the consumption of sviṣṭakṛt, because of the similarity of the reason.🔽Or there would be a prohibition in the seeing of the iḍā.

analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ vā vidhi pūrvasya darśanāt
translated: Or there would be a prohibition of what is preceded by an injunction, because of seeing.

original: śaṃyviḍāntatve vikalpaḥ syāt pareṣu patnyanuyājapratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: śaṃyu iḍā anta tve vikalpaḥ syāt pareṣu patnī anuyāja pratiṣedhaḥ narthakaḥ syāt  /
translated: In the case of the end of the śaṃyu and iḍā, there would be an option. The prohibition of the wife's anuyāja in the others would be meaningless.

analyzed: nitya anuvādaḥ vā karmaṇaḥ syāt a śabda tvāt
translated: Or it would be a permanent restatement of the action, because of not being stated by words.

analyzed: pratiṣedha arthavat tvāt ca uttarasya parastāt pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: And because of the purposefulness of the prohibition, the prohibition would be after that.

original: prāpter vā pūrvasya vacanād atikramaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: prāpteḥ vā pūrvasya vacanāt atikramaḥ syāt
translated: Or because of the attainment, there would be transgression of the former due to the statement.

analyzed: pratiṣedhasya tvarā yukta tvāt tasya ca na anya deśa tvam
translated: But the prohibition is urgent, and that does not have another place.

analyzed: upasatsu yāvat uktam akarma syāt
translated: In the Upasads, it would be non-action as much as stated.

original: stroveṇa vāguṇatvāc cheṣapratiṣedhaḥ syāt / / / /🔽apratiṣedhaṃ vā pratiṣidhyapratiprasavāt / / / /
analyzed: stroveṇa vā a guṇa tvāt śeṣa pratiṣedhaḥ syāt  a pratiṣedham vā pratiṣidhya pratiprasavāt
translated: In the Sruva, because of the quality of the word, there would be a prohibition of the remainder.🔽Or there is no prohibition, because of the non-reversal of the prohibition.

analyzed: an ijyā vā śeṣasya mukhya devatān abhījya tvāt
translated: Or it is not to be offered, because the remainder is not to be offered to the principal deity.

analyzed: avabhṛthe barhiṣaḥ pratiṣedhāt śeṣa karma syāt  /
translated: In the Avabhrtha, because of the prohibition of the sacrificial grass, there would be a remainder rite.

analyzed: ājyabhāgayoḥ vā guṇa tvāt śeṣa pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: Or in the two portions of clarified butter, because of the quality, there would be a prohibition of the remainder.

original: prayājānāṃ tv ekadeśapratiṣedhād vākyaśeṣatvaṃ tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: prayājānām tu eka deśa pratiṣedhāt vākya śeṣa tvam tasmāt nitya anuvādaḥ syāt  /
translated: But in the Prayajas, because of the prohibition of a part, there is the nature of a remainder of the sentence, therefore it would be a permanent restatement.

original: ājyabhāgayor grahaṇaṃ vityānuvādo vā gṛhamedhīyavat syāt / / / /
analyzed: ājyabhāgayoḥ grahaṇam vityā anuvādaḥ vā gṛhamedhīya vat syāt
translated: In the two portions of clarified butter, the grasping is a restatement, or it would be like the Grihamedha.

original: virodhinām ekaśrutau niyamaḥ syād grahaṇasyārthavattvāc charavac ca śrutito viśiṣṭatvāt / / / /
analyzed: virodhinām eka śrutau niyamaḥ syāt grahaṇasya arthavat tvāt śara vat ca śrutitaḥ viśiṣṭa tvāt  /
translated: In the hearing of one of the contradictory, there would be a rule, because of the purposefulness of the grasping, and because of the superiority of the hearing to the arrow.

analyzed: ubhaya pradeśāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not from both regions,

analyzed: śareṣu api iti ced
translated: if it is argued that it is also in the arrows,

analyzed: virodhya grahaṇāt tathā śareṣu iti ced
translated: if it is argued that it is so in the arrows because of the non-grasping of the contradictory,

analyzed: tathā itarāsmin  /
translated: so in the other.

analyzed: śruti ānarthakyam iti ced
translated: If it be said that the Veda would be meaningless...

analyzed: grahaṇasya arthavat tvāt grahaṇam apravṛtte syāt
translated: ... because the taking is meaningful, the taking would be in the absence of the performance.

original: sarvāsāṃ ca guṇānām arthavattvād grahaṇam apravṛtte syāt / / / /
analyzed: sarvāsām ca guṇānām arthavat tvāt grahaṇam a pravṛtte syāt
translated: ... and because all the qualities are meaningful, the taking would be in the absence of the performance.

analyzed: adhikam syāt iti ced
translated: If it be said that there would be an excess...

analyzed: na artha abhāvāt
translated: ... it is not so, because of the absence of meaning.

original: tathaikārthavikāre prākṛtasyāpravṛttiḥ pravṛttau hi vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: tathā eka artha vikāre prākṛtasya apravṛttiḥ pravṛttau hi vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: And in the modification of the same meaning, there is no performance of the original, for if there were performance, there would be an option.

analyzed: yāvacchruti iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is as much as the Veda...

original: na prakṛtāv aśabdatvāt / / / /🔽vikṛtau tv aniyamaḥ syāt praṣadājyavad grahaṇasya guṇārthatvād ubhayoś ca pradiṣṭatvād guṇaśāstraṃ yadeti syāt / / / /
analyzed: na prakṛtau aśabda tvāt  vikṛtau tu aniyamaḥ syāt praṣad ājya vat grahaṇasya guṇa artha tvāt ubhayoḥ ca pradiṣṭa tvāt guṇa śāstram yadā iti syāt  /
translated: ... it is not so, because in the original there is no word.🔽But in the modification there would be no restriction, like the sprinkling of clarified butter, because the taking is for the sake of the quality, and both are prescribed, and the quality-injunction would be that which comes.

analyzed: aikārthyāt vā niyamyeta śrutitaḥ viśiṣṭa tvāt
translated: Or it would be restricted by the oneness of meaning, because of the superiority of the Vedic text.

analyzed: virodhi tvāt ca loka vat
translated: And because of the contradictory nature, like in the world.

analyzed: kratoḥ ca tad guṇa tvāt
translated: And because the sacrifice is of the nature of that quality.

original: virodhināñ ca tacchrutāv aśabdatvād vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: virodhinām ca tad śrutau aśabda tvāt vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: And in the hearing of the contradictory ones, there would be an option because of the absence of the word.

analyzed: pṛṣadājye samuccayāt grahaṇasya guṇa artha tvam
translated: In the sprinkling of clarified butter, there is combination, therefore the taking is for the sake of the quality.🔽And although the four-mouthed one is not logically possible...

original: yady api caturavattīti tu niyame nopapadyate / / / /
analyzed: yadi api catur avatti iti tu niyame na upapadyate
translated: And although it is not possible to say that he is a performer of the four-poured offering, . . .🔽. . . .

analyzed: kratu antare vā tad nyāya tvāt karma bhedāt  /
translated: Or in another ritual, because that is the rule, due to the difference in the rites.

analyzed: yathāśruti iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is according to the Vedic text,

analyzed: na codana ekatvāt
translated: it is not so, because of the unity of the injunction.

original: pratiṣedhaḥ pradeśe 'nārabhyavidhāne ca prāptapratiṣiddhatvād vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ pradeśe na ārabhya vidhāne ca prāpta pratiṣiddha tvāt vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: In the section on prohibition and in the injunction without beginning, there would be an option due to the prohibition of what is already obtained.

analyzed: artha prāpta vat iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is like what is obtained from the meaning,

original: na tulyahetutvād ubhayaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam / / / /🔽api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syād anyāyyatvād vikalpasya vidhīnām ekadeśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: na tulya hetu tvāt ubhayam śabda lakṣaṇam  api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syāt anyāyya tvāt vikalpasya vidhīnām eka deśaḥ syāt
translated: it is not so, because both are characterized by sound, due to having the same cause.🔽But it would be a supplementary passage, because an option is unreasonable. It would be a part of the injunctions.

analyzed: apūrve ca arthavādaḥ syāt
translated: And in the unseen, it would be a praise.

analyzed: śiṣṭvā tu pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: But after the performance, there would be a prohibition.

original: na ced anyaṃ prakalpayet prakḷptāv arthavādaḥ syād ānarthakyāt parasāmarthyāc ca / / / /
analyzed: na ced anyam prakalpayet prakḷptau artha vādaḥ syāt ānarthakyāt para sāmarthyāt ca  /
translated: If not, in the case of an assumed [prohibition], it would be a praise, because of the meaninglessness and the power of another.

analyzed: pūrvaiḥ ca tulya kāla tvāt
translated: And because of being of the same time as the previous [prohibitions].

analyzed: upavādaḥ ca tadvat
translated: And the censure is the same.

analyzed: pratiṣedhāt akarma iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not an action due to the prohibition,

analyzed: na śabda pūrva tvāt
translated: it is not so, because it is preceded by the word.

analyzed: dīkṣitasya dāna homa pāka pratiṣedhaḥ viśeṣāt sarva dāna homa pāka pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: In the case of one who has been initiated, there would be a prohibition of giving, offering, and cooking without distinction, so it would be a prohibition of all giving, offering, and cooking.

original: akratuyuktānāṃ vā dharmaḥ syāt kratoḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt / / / /
analyzed: a kratu yuktānām vā dharmaḥ syāt kratoḥ pratyakṣa śiṣṭa tvāt
translated: Or the dharma may belong to those not connected with a sacrifice, because the sacrifice is directly enjoined.

original: tasya vāpy ānumānikam aviśeṣāt / / / /🔽api tu vākyaśeṣatvād itaraparyudāsaḥ syāt pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: tasya vā api ānumānikam aviśeṣāt  / api tu vākya śeṣa tvāt itara paryudāsaḥ syāt pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: Or that (dharma) may be inferred, because there is no distinction.🔽But rather, because of being a supplementary passage, there would be exclusion of the other. In the prohibition, there would be an option.

original: aviśeṣeṇa yac chāstram anyāyyatvād vikalpasya tat sandigdham ārād viśeṣaśiṣṭaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa yat śāstram anyāyya tvāt vikalpasya tat sandigdham ārāt viśeṣa śiṣṭam syāt
translated: Because the scripture is without distinction, and because of the impropriety of an option, that is doubtful. The distinction taught later would be.

original: aprakaraṇe tu yac chāstraṃ viśeṣe śruyamāṇam avikṛtam ājyabhāgavat prākṛtapratiṣedhārtham / / / /
analyzed: a prakaraṇe tu yat śāstram viśeṣe śruyamāṇam a vikṛtam ājyabhāga vat prākṛta pratiṣedha artham
translated: But in the absence of a context, the scripture, when heard in a particular case, unmodified, like the Ajyabhagas, is for the prohibition of the original.

analyzed: vikāre tu tad artham syāt
translated: But in a modification, it would be for that purpose.

original: vākyaśeṣo vā kratunā grahaṇāt syād anārabhyavidhānasya / / / /
analyzed: vākya śeṣaḥ vā kratunā grahaṇāt syāt an ārabhya vidhānasya
translated: Or the supplementary passage would be due to the grasping by the sacrifice, of the injunction not beginning with a root.

analyzed: mantreṣu a vākya śeṣa tvam guṇa upadeśāt syāt
translated: In the mantras, there would be no supplementary passage, because of the teaching of a quality.

analyzed: an āmnāte ca darśanāt
translated: And because of the seeing of what is not mentioned.

analyzed: pratiṣedhāt ca
translated: And because of the prohibition.

analyzed: agni atigrāhyasya vikṛtau upadeśāt apravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: In a modification, there would be no application of the agni-atigraharya because of the teaching.

analyzed: māsi grahaṇam ca tadvāt
translated: And the grasping in the month is due to that.

analyzed: grahaṇam vā tulya tvāt
translated: Or the grasping is the same because of similarity.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the seeing of the mark.

analyzed: grahaṇam samāna vidhānam syāt
translated: The grasping would be the same injunction.

analyzed: māsigrahaṇam abhyāsa pratiṣedha artham
translated: The mention of the month is for the purpose of prohibiting repetition.

original: utpattitādarthyāc caturavattama pradhānasya homasaṃyogād adhikam ājyam atulyatvāl lokavad utpatter guṇabhūtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: utpatti tādarthyāt caturavattama pradhānasya homa saṃyogāt adhikam ājyam atulya tvāt loka vat utpatteḥ guṇa bhūta tvāt  /
translated: And because of the origination and purpose, the ghee is more than the four portions due to the connection of the principal with the homa, because of the origination being unequal like in the world, due to being subordinate.

analyzed: tad saṃskāra śruteḥ ca
translated: And because of the mention of its purification.

original: tābhyāṃ vā saha sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sakṛttve dvipabhighāraṇena tadāptivacanāt / / / /
analyzed: tābhyām vā saha sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sakṛt tve dvipa abhighāraṇena tad āpti vacanāt  /
translated: Or with those two, of the sviṣṭakṛt, due to the statement of its attainment by the double-pouring in the case of oneness.

analyzed: tulya vat ca abhidhāya sarveṣu bhakti anukramaṇāt
translated: And like the equal, after mentioning all in order of devotion.

analyzed: sāptadaśya vat niyamyeta  /
translated: It would be restricted like the Saptadaśa.

analyzed: haviṣaḥ vā guṇa bhūta tvāt tathābhūta vivakṣā syāt
translated: Or because of being subordinate to the oblation, there would be the desire to express it as such.

original: puroḍāśābhyām itya dhikṛtānāṃ puroḍāśayor upadeśas tacchrutitvād vaiśyastomavat / / / /
analyzed: puroḍāśābhyām iti a dhikṛtānām puroḍāśayoḥ upadeśaḥ tad śruti tvāt vaiśyastoma vat  /
translated: The teaching of the two sacrificial cakes prepared with the two sacrificial cakes, because of the mention of that, like in the case of the Viśvajit.

original: na tv anityādhikāro 'sti vidhau nityena sambandhas tasmād avākyaśeṣatvam / / / /
analyzed: na tu anitya adhikāraḥ asti vidhau nityena sambandhaḥ tasmāt a vākyaśeṣa tvam
translated: But there is no optional authority, the connection with the permanent is in the injunction, therefore it is not a part of the remainder.

analyzed: sati ca na eka deśena kartuḥ pradhāna bhūta tvāt
translated: And when there is, by no part, because of the principal nature of the performer.

analyzed: kṛtsna tvāt tu tathā stome  /
translated: But because of completeness, it is like in the stoma.

analyzed: kartuḥ syāt iti ced
translated: If it is said that it would be of the performer.

analyzed: na guṇa artha tvāt prāpte na ca upadeśa arthaḥ
translated: Not so, because of the purpose of the subsidiary, and the injunction is not for the purpose of the injunction.

original: karmaṇos tu prakaraṇe tannyāyatvād guṇānāṃ liṅgena kālaśāstraṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: karmaṇoḥ tu prakaraṇe tad nyāya tvāt guṇānām liṅgena kāla śāstram syāt
translated: But in the context of the two actions, because of the propriety of that, the rule regarding time would be by the indicative mark of the subsidiaries.

original: yadi tu sānnāyyaṃ somayājino na tābhyāṃ samavāyo 'sti vibhaktakālatvāt / / / /
analyzed: yadi tu sānnāyyam soma yājinaḥ na tābhyām samavāyaḥ u sti vibhakta kāla tvāt
translated: If, however, the Sannāya is not connected with those two by the Soma-sacrificer, because of the fixed time.

original: api vā vihitatvād guṇārthāyāṃ punaḥ śrutau sandehe śrutir dvidevatārthā syād yathānabhipretas tathāgneyo darśanād ekadevate / / /
analyzed: api vā vihita tvāt guṇa arthāyām punar śrutau sandehe śrutiḥ dvi devatā arthā syāt yathā anabhipretaḥ tathā āgneyaḥ darśanāt eka devate  /
translated: Or, if there is doubt in the restatement for the purpose of the subsidiary because of the injunction, the Śruti would be for the sake of the two deities, as it is not intended, so the one-deity is seen in the case of the Āgneya.

analyzed: vidhim tu bādarāyaṇaḥ
translated: But Bādarāyaṇa holds that it is an injunction.

analyzed: pratiṣiddha vijñānāt vā
translated: Or because of the knowledge of what is prohibited.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And so there is the seeing of another meaning.

original: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti havirliṅgāśrutitvād yathākāmī pratīyeta / / / /
analyzed: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajati iti haviḥ liṅga aśruti tvāt yathākāmī pratīyeta  /
translated: One should offer the Upāṃśuyāja in between, because of the indication of the oblation and the non-hearing, it should be understood according to one's desire.

analyzed: dhrauvāt vā sarva saṃyogāt
translated: Or from the Dhruva, because of the connection with all.

analyzed: tadvat ca devatāyām syāt
translated: And so it would be in the case of the deity.

analyzed: tāndrīṇām prakaraṇāt  /
translated: Of the three, because of the context.

analyzed: dharmāt vā syāt prajāpatiḥ  /
translated: Or it would be Prajāpati because of the dharma.

original: devatāyās tv anirvacanaṃ tatra śabdasyeha mṛdutvaṃ tasmād ihādhikāreṇa / / / /
analyzed: devatāyāḥ tu anirvacanam tatra śabdasya iha mṛdu tvam tasmāt iha adhikāreṇa
translated: But the deity is not specified, there the word is soft, therefore here by the authority.

original: viṣṇur vā syād dhautrāmnānād amāvāsyāhaviś ca syād dhautrasya tatra darśanāt / / / /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ vā syāt dhautra āmnānāt amāvāsyā haviḥ ca syāt dhautrasya tatra darśanāt  /
translated: Or it may be Viṣṇu, because of the mention in the Hāutrāgni, and the offering of the new-moon day may be for Viṣṇu, because of the Hāutrāgni being seen there.

original: api vā paurṇamāsyāṃ syāt pradhānaśabdasaṃyogād guṇatvān mantro yathā pradhānaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā paurṇamāsyām syāt pradhāna śabda saṃyogāt guṇa tvāt mantraḥ yathā pradhānam syāt
translated: Or it may be on the full moon day, because of the connection with the principal word, and because of the mantra being secondary, it may be principal.

original: ānantaryañ ca sānnāyyasya puroḍāśena darśayaty amāvāsyāvikāre / / / /
analyzed: ānantaryam ca sānnāyyasya puroḍāśena darśayati amāvāsyā vikāre
translated: And the sequence of the Sānnāyya is shown by the cake on the new moon day, in the modification.

analyzed: agnīṣoma vidhānāt tu paurṇamāsyām ubhayatra vidhīyate  /
translated: But because of the injunction of Agni and Soma, it is enjoined on both sides on the full moon day.

analyzed: pratiṣiddhi avidhānāt vā viṣṇuḥ samāna deśaḥ syāt
translated: Or, because of the injunction of what is prohibited, Viṣṇu would be in the same place.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And so there is the seeing of another meaning.

original: na cānaṅga sakṛc chrutāv ubhayatra vidhīyotāsambandhāt / / / /
analyzed: na ca anaṅga sakṛt śrutau ubhayatra vidhīya uta asambandhāt  /
translated: And what is not a part is not enjoined on both sides when mentioned once, because of non-connection.

original: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvāt pravṛttau vidhiliṅgāni darśayati / / / /
analyzed: guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt pravṛttau vidhi liṅgāni darśayati
translated: And because the qualities are for another's purpose, he shows the indications of injunction in the engagement.

analyzed: vikāre ca aśruti tvāt
translated: And in the modification, because of non-hearing.

analyzed: dvi puroḍāśāyām syāt antarā artha tvāt  /
translated: It would be in the two-cake offering, because of the purpose of the interval.

analyzed: ajāmi karaṇa artha tvāt ca
translated: And because of the purpose of the non-female animal sacrifice.

analyzed: tad artham iti ced na tad pradhāna tvāt
translated: If it be said that it is for that purpose, it is not so, because of its being principal.

analyzed: aśiṣṭhena ca sambandhāt  /
translated: And because of the connection with the most venerable.

original: utpattes tu niveśaḥ syād guṇasyānuparodhenārthasya vidyamānatvād vidhānād antarārthasya naimittikatvāt tadabhāve 'śrutau syāt / / /
analyzed: utpatteḥ tu niveśaḥ syāt guṇasya an uparodhena arthasya vidyamāna tvāt vidhānāt antarā arthasya naimittika tvāt tad abhāve śrutau syāt
translated: But the application of the subsidiary acts would be to the origination, not being incompatible with the purpose, because the purpose exists, because of the injunction, because of the difference in the purpose, because of the occasional nature, it would be in the absence of that.

original: ubhayos tu vidhānāt / / / /🔽guṇānāñ ca parārthatvād upaveṣavad yadeti syāt / / / /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ tu vidhānāt  guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt upaveṣavat yadā iti syāt
translated: But because of the injunction of both,🔽and because the subsidiaries are for another's purpose, it would be like the upavesha, it would be as it is.

original: anapāyaś ca kālasya lakṣaṇaṃ hi puroḍāśau / / / /
analyzed: anapāyaḥ ca kālasya lakṣaṇam hi puroḍāśau
translated: And the time is not lost, for the puronuvakya and puronuvakya are indeed the characteristics.

analyzed: praśaṃsā artham ajāmi tvam
translated: The non-production is for the purpose of praise.

original: prayojanābhisambandhāt pṛthak satāṃ tataḥ syād aikakarmyam ekaśabdābhisaṃyogāt / / / /
analyzed: prayojana abhisambandhāt pṛthak satām tatas syāt aikakarmyam eka śabda abhisaṃyogāt  /
translated: Because of the connection with the purpose, they would be separate and then there would be unity of action due to the connection with the single word.

original: śeṣavad vā prayojanaṃ pratijanaṃ pratikarma vibhajyeta / / / /
analyzed: śeṣavat vā prayojanam pratijanam pratikarma vibhajyeta  /
translated: Or the purpose would be divided according to each person and action like the remainder.

analyzed: avidhānāt tu na evam syāt
translated: But it would not be so because of the non-injunction.

original: śeṣasya hi parārthatvād vidhānāt pratipradhānabhāvaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: śeṣasya hi para artha tvāt vidhānāt pratipradhāna bhāvaḥ syāt
translated: For the remainder is for another's purpose, the principal would be for each principal due to the injunction.

original: aṅgānāṃ tu śabdabhedāt kratuvat syāt phalānayatvam / / / /
analyzed: aṅgānām tu śabda bhedāt kratu vat syāt phala ānaya tvam
translated: But because of the difference in words of the subsidiaries, there would be the bringing of the fruits like in the sacrifice.

analyzed: artha bhedaḥ tu tatra atha iha aikārthyāt aikakarmyam
translated: But there the difference in meaning is due to the unity of purpose here, there is unity of action.

analyzed: śabda bhedāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not so because of the difference in words,

analyzed: karma artha tvāt prayoge tācchabdyam syāt tad artha tvāt
translated: Because of being for the sake of the action, there would be the same word in the application, because of being for that purpose.

analyzed: kartṛ vidheḥ nānā artha tvāt guṇa pradhāneṣu
translated: Because of the non-distinctness of the injunction of the agent, in the primary and secondary,

analyzed: ārambhasya śabda pūrva tvāt
translated: Because of the precedence of the word in the beginning,

original: ekenāpi samāpyeta kṛtārthatvād yathā kratvantareṣu prāpteṣu cottarāvat syāt / / / /
analyzed: ekena api samāpyeta kṛtārtha tvāt yathā kratu antareṣu prāpteṣu ca uttarāvat syāt
translated: It could be completed even by one, because of having fulfilled the purpose, as in the case of the obtained other sacrifices, it would be like the subsequent.

analyzed: phala abhāvāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not because of the absence of result,

analyzed: na karma saṃyogāt prayojana ba śabda doṣam syāt
translated: There would be the fault of the word of purpose because of the connection with the action.

analyzed: ekaśabdyāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is because of the single word,

analyzed: na artha pṛthaktvāt sama tvāt aguṇa tvam
translated: It is not so, because of the difference in meaning, because of equality, the secondary nature.

original: vidhes tv ekaśrutitvād aparyāyavidhānān nityavac chrutabhūtābhisaṃyogād arthena yugapatprāpter yathāprāptaṃ svaśabdo nivītavat sarvaprayoge
analyzed: vidheḥ tu eka śruti tvāt a paryāya vidhānāt nitya vat śruta bhūta abhisaṃyogāt arthena yugapad prāpteḥ yathāprāptam sva śabdaḥ nivīta vat sarva prayoge  /
translated: But because of the single hearing of the injunction, because of the injunction of the non-synonyms, because of the connection with the heard elements as in the case of the permanent, because of the simultaneous attainment by the meaning, as obtained, the word of one's own, like the nivita, in all the applications,

analyzed: pravṛttiḥ syāt
translated: The engagement would be.

analyzed: tathā karma upadeśa tvāt
translated: Similarly, because of the teaching of the action,

analyzed: kratu antareṣu punarvacanam
translated: The repetition in the other sacrifices.

original: uttarāsvaśrutitvād viśeṣāṇāṃ kṛtārthatvāt saṃdohe yathākāmī pratīyeta / / / /
analyzed: uttarāsu aśruti tvāt viśeṣāṇām kṛtārtha tvāt saṃdohe yathākāmī pratīyeta  /
translated: Because of the non-hearing in the subsequent, because of the fulfillment of the purposes, in the combination, one could understand according to one's desire.

original: karmaṇy ārambhabhāvyatvāt kṛṣivat pratyārambhaṃ phalāni syuḥ / / / /🔽adhikāraś ca sarveṣāṃ kāryatvād upapadyate viśeṣaḥ / / / /
analyzed: karmaṇi ārambha bhāvya tvāt kṛṣi vat pratyārambham phalāni syuḥ  adhikāraḥ ca sarveṣām kārya tvāt upapadyate viśeṣaḥ
translated: Because of the need to begin the action, the results would be at each beginning, like agriculture.🔽And the qualification of all is proper because of the purpose, the distinction...

analyzed: sakṛt tu syāt kṛtārtha tvāt aṅga vat
translated: But it would be once, because of the purpose being served, like the subsidiary acts...

analyzed: śabda arthaḥ ca tathā loke
translated: And the meaning of the word is like that in the world...

original: api vā saṃprayoge yathākāmī pratīyetāśrutitvād vidhiṣu vacanāni syuḥ / / / /
analyzed: api vā saṃprayoge yathākāmī pratīyeta a śruti tvāt vidhiṣu vacanāni syuḥ  /
translated: Or in connection, it would be understood according to desire, because of not being heard, the statements would be in the injunctions...

analyzed: ekaśabdyāt tathā aṅgeṣu
translated: Because of the word one, it is like that in the subsidiary acts...

analyzed: loke karma artha lakṣaṇam
translated: In the world, the characteristic of the purpose of action...

analyzed: kriyāṇām artha śeṣa tvāt pratyakṣataḥ tad nirvṛttyā apavargaḥ syāt
translated: Because of the actions being subsidiary to the purpose, the completion would be directly by the accomplishment of that...

analyzed: dharma mātre tu adarśanāt śabda arthena apavargaḥ syāt
translated: But in the case of mere dharma, the completion would be by the meaning of the word, because of not being seen...

analyzed: kratu vat ca anumānena abhyāse phala bhūmā syāt
translated: And by inference, like in the case of the sacrifice, the repetition would be the ground of the result...

analyzed: sakṛt vā kāraṇa ekatvāt
translated: Or once, because of the oneness of the cause...

analyzed: parimāṇam ca aniyamena syāt
translated: And the measure would be without restriction...

analyzed: phalasya ārambha nirvṛtteḥ kratuṣu syāt phala anya tvam
translated: In the sacrifices, the results would be different because of the commencement and completion of the result...

original: arthavāṃs tu naikatvād abhyāsaḥ syād anarthako yathā bhojanam ekasminn arthasyāparimāṇatvāt pradhāne ca kriyārthatvād aniyamaḥ syāt / / /
analyzed: arthavān tu na eka tvāt abhyāsaḥ syāt anarthakaḥ yathā bhojanam ekasmin arthasya a parimāṇa tvāt pradhāne ca kriyā artha tvāt aniyamaḥ syāt
translated: But when there is a purpose, repetition would be purposeless due to oneness, like eating once, because the purpose is not measured, and there is no restriction in the principal due to being for the sake of the action.

analyzed: pṛthaktvāt vidhitaḥ parimāṇam syāt
translated: The measurement would be by injunction due to separateness.

original: anabhyāso vā prayogavacanaikatvāt sarvasya yugapacchāstrād aphalatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ syāt kriyārthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: anabhyāsaḥ vā prayoga vacana eka tvāt sarvasya yugapad śāstrāt aphala tvāt ca karmaṇaḥ syāt kriyā artha tvāt  /
translated: Or there would be no repetition due to the oneness of the statement of performance, and because the result of all actions would be simultaneous according to the scriptures, there would be (no repetition) due to being for the sake of the action.

analyzed: abhyāsaḥ vā chedana saṃmārga avadāneṣu vacanāt sakṛt tvasya
translated: Or there would be repetition in the cases of cutting and sweeping due to the statement of oneness.

analyzed: anabhyāsaḥ tu vācya tvāt
translated: But there would be no repetition due to being stated.

original: bahuvacanena sarvaprāpter vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /🔽dṛṣṭaḥ prayoga iti cet / / / /
analyzed: bahuvacanena sarva prāpteḥ vikalpaḥ syāt  dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ iti ced
translated: There would be an option due to the attainment of all by the plural.🔽If it is argued that the usage is seen,

analyzed: bhaktyā iti ced
translated: if it is argued that it is due to devotion,

analyzed: tathā itarasmin  /
translated: then in the other case also,

original: prathamaṃ vā niyamyeta kāraṇād atikramaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: prathamam vā niyamyeta kāraṇāt atikramaḥ syāt
translated: or it would be restricted to the first, the transgression would be due to a reason.

analyzed: śruti artha aviśeṣāt
translated: Due to the non-distinction of the meaning of the Vedic text.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam  prakṛtyā ca pūrvavat tad āsatteḥ
translated: And the seeing of another meaning in that way.🔽And due to the natural connection with the previous one.

analyzed: uttarāsu yāvatsvam apūrva tvāt  /
translated: In the subsequent ones, up to one's own, due to being new.

analyzed: yāvatsvam vā anya vidhānena anuvādaḥ syāt
translated: Or up to one's own, there would be a restatement by the injunction of another.

analyzed: sākalya vidhānāt
translated: Because of the injunction of the whole...

analyzed: bahu artha tvāt ca
translated: And because of the many meanings...

analyzed: agnihotre ca aśeṣa vat yavāgū niyamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kumārāṇām
translated: And in the Agnihotra, the rule about barley and rice is a prohibition for young boys.

analyzed: sarva prāyiṇā api liṅgena saṃyujyate devatā abhisaṃyogāt
translated: Even though it is for all, it is connected by the indicative power, because of the connection with the deity.

original: pradhānakarmārthatvād aṅgānāṃ tadbhedāt karmabhedaḥ prayoge syāt / / / /
analyzed: pradhāna karma artha tvāt aṅgānām tad bhedāt karma bhedaḥ prayoge syāt
translated: Because the subsidiaries are for the sake of the primary rite, by their distinction there would be a difference in the rite in the performance.

analyzed: krama kopaḥ ca yaugapadyāt syāt
translated: And there would be a disturbance of the sequence because of simultaneity.

original: tulyānāṃ tu yaugapadyam ekaśabdopadeśāt syād viśeṣāgrahaṇāt / / / /
analyzed: tulyānām tu yaugapadyam eka śabda upadeśāt syāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt
translated: But for those of equal status, there would be simultaneity because of the teaching by one word, due to the non-apprehension of a distinction.

analyzed: ekārthyāt avyavāyaḥ syāt
translated: There would be no interruption because of the same purpose.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam kāmukāyanaḥ
translated: And so the seeing of another meaning by Kāmuka's son.

original: tannyāyatvād aśakter ānupūrvyaṃ syāt saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: tad nyāya tvāt aśakteḥ ānupūrvyam syāt saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt
translated: And because of the principle, there would be sequence due to incapacity, because the consecration is for that purpose.

analyzed: a saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pi tādarthyāt
translated: Even though not mixed, it is for that purpose.

analyzed: vibhavāt vā pradīpa vat
translated: Or because of ability, like a lamp.

original: arthāt tu loke vidhitaḥ pratipradhānaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: arthāt tu loke vidhitaḥ pratipradhānam syāt
translated: But in the world, it would be for each primary rite because of the injunction.

analyzed: sakṛt ijyām kāmukāyanaḥ parimāṇa virodhāt
translated: Kāmuka's son says that the sacrifice is to be performed once, because of the contradiction with the measure.

original: vidhes tv itarārthatvāt sakṛd ijyāśrutivyatikramaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: vidheḥ tu itara artha tvāt sakṛt ijyā śruti vyatikramaḥ syāt  /
translated: But because of the injunction being for another purpose, there would be a transgression of the statement that the sacrifice is to be performed once.

analyzed: vidhivat prakaraṇa avibhāge prayogam bādarāyaṇaḥ  /
translated: Bādarāyaṇa holds that the application is according to the rule, without distinction of sections.

analyzed: api ca ekena sannidhānam aviśeṣakaḥ hetuḥ
translated: Moreover, the proximity of one is a reason that does not distinguish.

analyzed: kvacid vidhānāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not so because of the injunction in some cases,

analyzed: na vidheḥ codita tvāt
translated: it is not so because the injunction is enjoined.

analyzed: vyākhyātam tulyānām yaugapadyam a gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣāṇām
translated: The simultaneity of equals, whose distinctions are not grasped, has been explained.

original: bhedas tu kālabhedāc codanāvyavāyāt syād viśiṣṭānāṃ vidhiḥ pradhānakālatvāt / / / /
analyzed: bhedaḥ tu kāla bhedāt codanā vyavāyāt syāt viśiṣṭānām vidhiḥ pradhāna kāla tvāt
translated: But there is distinction due to the difference in time, and the injunction of the qualified is due to the priority of the principal time.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And thus there is the observation of another purpose.

analyzed: vidhiḥ iti ced na vartamāna apadeśāt
translated: If it is argued that it is an injunction, it is not so because of the statement of the present.

analyzed: eka deśa kāla kartṛ tva mukhyānām eka śabda upadeśāt
translated: The oneness of place, time, and agent of the principal ones is due to the teaching of the single word.

original: avidhiś cet karmaṇām abhisambandhaḥ pratīyeta tallakṣaṇārthābhisaṃyogād vidhitvāc cetareṣāṃ pratipradhānabhāvaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: avidhiḥ ced karmaṇām abhisambandhaḥ pratīyeta tad lakṣaṇa artha abhisaṃyogāt vidhi tvāt ca itareṣām pratipradhāna bhāvaḥ syāt  /
translated: If it is argued that it is not an injunction, the connection of the actions would be understood, and due to the connection for the purpose of the definition, and due to the injunctive nature, the other ones would have the nature of being subordinate to each principal.

analyzed: aṅgeṣu ca tad abhāvaḥ pradhānam pratinirdeśāt
translated: And in the subsidiaries, that is absent, because of the substitution for the principal.

original: yadi tu karmaṇo vidhisambandhaḥ syād aikaśabdyāt pradhānārthābhidhāsaṃyogāt / / / /
analyzed: yadi tu karmaṇaḥ vidhi sambandhaḥ syāt aikaśabdyāt pradhāna artha abhidhā saṃyogāt
translated: But if there were a connection of the action with the injunction, due to the single word, and due to the connection with the expression of the meaning of the principal,

analyzed: tathā
translated: thus there is the observation of another purpose.

analyzed: śrutiḥ ca eṣām pradhāna vat karma śruteḥ parārtha tvāt
translated: And their recitation is like that of the principal, because the injunction of the rite is for another's purpose.

analyzed: karmaṇaḥ śruti tvāt ca
translated: And because the rite is not heard.

original: aṅgāni tu vidhānatvāt pradhānenopadiśyeraṃs tasmāt syād ekadeśatvam / / / /
analyzed: aṅgāni tu vidhāna tvāt pradhānena upadiśyeran tasmāt syāt eka deśa tvam
translated: But the auxiliaries should be taught by the principal because of the injunction, therefore there would be partial character.

analyzed: dravya devatam tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is so for the substance and deity,

analyzed: na codanā vidhi śeṣa tvāt niyama arthaḥ viśeṣaḥ
translated: then the distinction is for the purpose of restriction, because of being a part of the injunction of the injunction.

original: teṣu samavetānāṃ samavāyāt tantram aṅgāni bhedas tu tadbhedāt karmabhedaḥ prayoge syāt teṣāṃ pradhānaśabdatvāt tathā cānyārthadarśanam / / /
analyzed: teṣu samavetānām samavāyāt tantram aṅgāni bhedaḥ tu tad bhedāt karma bhedaḥ prayoge syāt teṣām pradhāna śabda tvāt tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: Because of the inherence of those that inhere in them, the auxiliaries form a unit. But the distinction is due to their distinction. There would be a distinction in the performance due to the principal word. And so the other meaning is seen.

analyzed: iṣṭi rājasūya cāturmāsyeṣu aikakarmyāt aṅgānām tantra bhāvaḥ syāt  /
translated: In the Ishti, Rajasuya, and Chaturmasya sacrifices, the auxiliaries would form a unit due to the oneness of the rite.

analyzed: kāla bhedāt na iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not so due to the difference in time,

analyzed: na eka deśa tvāt paśu vat
translated: then it is not so, because of being a part, like the animal.

original: api vā karmapṛthaktvāt teṣāṃ tantravidhānāt sāṅgānām upadeśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā karma pṛthaktvāt teṣām tantra vidhānāt sa aṅgānām upadeśaḥ syāt
translated: Or rather, due to the separateness of the rites, the teaching of the auxiliaries would be of those whose injunction is a unit.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And so the other meaning is seen.

analyzed: tathā tad avayaveṣu syāt
translated: So it would be in its parts.

original: paśau tu codanaikatvāt tantrasya viprakarṣaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: paśau tu codanā ekatvāt tantrasya viprakarṣaḥ syāt
translated: But in the animal sacrifice, due to the oneness of the injunction, there would be remoteness of the unit.

analyzed: tathā syāt adhvarakalpa iṣṭau viśeṣasya eka kāla tvāt  /
translated: It would be so in the sacrifice like the Adhvara, because of the oneness of the special (rite) at one time.

analyzed: iṣṭiḥ iti ca eka vat śrutiḥ
translated: And the word 'Iṣṭi' is heard as one.

original: api vā karmapṛthakatvāt teṣāṃ ca tantravidhānāt sāṅgānām upadeśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā karma pṛthaka tvāt teṣām ca tantra vidhānāt sa aṅgānām upadeśaḥ syāt  /
translated: Or, because of the separateness of the rites, and because of the injunction of their parts, there would be instruction of the parts.

analyzed: prathamasya vā kāla vacanam  /
translated: Or, the first (rite) is the statement of time.

analyzed: phala ekatvāt iṣṭi śabdaḥ yathā anyatra
translated: Because of the oneness of the result, the word 'Iṣṭi' is like in another (case).

analyzed: vasā homaḥ tantram eka devateṣu syāt pradānasya eka kāla tvāt  /
translated: The Vasu-offering would be a part of the sacrifice in the case of one deity, because of the oneness of the time of offering.

analyzed: kāla bhedāt tu āvṛttiḥ devatā bhede  /
translated: But because of the difference in time, there is repetition in the case of different deities.

analyzed: ante yūpa āhutiḥ tadvat
translated: At the end, the Yūpāhuti (oblation to the sacrificial post) is like that.

analyzed: itara pratiṣedhaḥ vā
translated: Or, it is a prohibition of the other.

analyzed: a śāstra tvāt ca deśānām
translated: And because of the non-authoritativeness of the regions.

original: avabhṛthe pradhāne 'gnivikāraḥ syān na hi taddhetur agnisaṃyogaḥ / / / /
analyzed: avabhṛthe pradhāne gni vikāraḥ syāt na hi tad hetuḥ agni saṃyogaḥ
translated: In the Avabhṛtha, the modification of the fire would be in the principal (rite), because the connection with the fire is not the cause of that.

analyzed: sa aṅgaḥ vā prayoda vacana ekatvāt  /
translated: Or, with its parts, because of the oneness of the statement of the performance.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the seeing of the mark.

analyzed: śabda vibhāgāt ca devatā an apanayaḥ
translated: And because of the division of the word, there is no removal of the deity.

analyzed: dakṣiṇe gnau varuṇapradhāseṣu deśa bhedāt sarvam kriyate  /
translated: In the southern fire, in the Varuṇa-Praghāsas, everything is done because of the difference in the regions.

analyzed: a codanā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not enjoined,

analyzed: syāt paurṇamāsī vat
translated: it would be like the Paurṇamāsī.

analyzed: prayoga cedanā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is the cutting off of the performance,

analyzed: iha api mārutyāḥ prayogaḥ codyate  /
translated: Here also, the application of the Marutvat hymn is enjoined.

analyzed: āsādānam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is a mere reference,

analyzed: na uttareṇa eka vākya tvāt  /
translated: no, because of syntactical unity with the next.

analyzed: avācya tvāt  āmnāya vacanam tadvat
translated: Because it is inexpressible.🔽The statement in the Veda is like that.

analyzed: kartṛ bhedaḥ tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that there is a difference of agent in that case,

analyzed: na samavāyāt  liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: no, because of inherence.🔽And because of the indication of a mark.

analyzed: vedi saṃyogāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is because of the connection with the altar,

analyzed: na deśa mātra tvāt
translated: no, because it is merely a place.

analyzed: eka vākya tvāt
translated: Because of syntactical unity.

analyzed: eka agni tvāt apareṣu tantram syāt
translated: Because of the single fire, the other rites would be subsidiary.

analyzed: nānā vā kartṛ bhedāt
translated: Or they may be separate, because of the difference of agents.

original: paryagnikṛtānām utsarge prājāpatyānāṃ karmotsargaḥ śrutisāmānayād āraṇyavat tasmād brahmasāmni codanāpṛthaktavaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: paryagnikṛtānām utsarge prājāpatyānām karma utsargaḥ śruti sāma ānayāt āraṇya vat tasmāt brahma sāmni codanā pṛthaktavam syāt  /
translated: In the case of the dismissal of the animals encircled by fire, the dismissal of the Prajapati rites is by the common text, like the forest rite. Therefore, in the Brahmasami hymn, there would be a separate injunction.

analyzed: saṃskāra pratiṣedhaḥ vā vākya ekatvaḥ kratu sāmānyāt
translated: Or it is a prohibition of the consecration, because of the unity of the sentence and the commonality of the sacrifice.

analyzed: vākya eka tve kratu sāmānyāt
translated: In the unity of the sentence, because of the commonality of the sacrifice.

analyzed: vapānām ca an abhighāraṇasya darśanāt
translated: And because of the non-sprinkling of the omenta being seen.

analyzed: pañcaśāradīyāḥ tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the five autumnal ones are like that,

analyzed: na codana eka vākya tvāt  yātayāma tvāt ca
translated: no, because of the unity of the injunction.🔽And because of the exhaustion.

analyzed: saṃskāraṇām ca tad darśanāt
translated: And because of the consecration being seen in that.

original: daśapeye krayapratikarṣāt pratikarṣas tataḥ prācāṃ tatsamānaṃ tantraṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: daśapeye kraya pratikarṣāt pratikarṣaḥ tatas prācām tad samānam tantram syāt  /
translated: In the Dashpeya sacrifice, there is a pulling away of the purchase, therefore the pulling away is from that, that would be the same procedure for the easterners.

analyzed: samāna vacanam tadvat
translated: The same statement is like that.

analyzed: atikarṣaḥ vā artha hetu tvāt
translated: The pulling away is because of being the cause of the purpose.

analyzed: pūrvasmin ca avabhṛthasya darśanāt  /
translated: And because of the seeing of the final bath in the previous one.

analyzed: samānaḥ kāla sāmānyāt  /
translated: The same because of the similarity of time.

analyzed: niṣkāsasya avabhṛthe tad eka deśa tvāt paśu vat pradāna viprakarṣaḥ syāt
translated: In the final bath, there would be a separation from the offering because of being a part of that, like an animal.

analyzed: apanayaḥ vā prasiddhena abhisaṃyogāt
translated: Or it is a removal because of the connection with the well-known one.

analyzed: pratipattiḥ iti ced na karma saṃyogāt
translated: If it is argued that it is a substitute, it is not so because of the connection with the action.

analyzed: udayanīye ca tadvat  pratipattiḥ vā a karma saṃyogāt
translated: And likewise in the Udayaniya.🔽Or it is a substitute because of the connection with the action.

original: arthakarma vā śeṣatvāc chrayaṇavat tadarthena vidhānāt / / / /
analyzed: artha karma vā śeṣa tvāt śrayaṇa vat tad arthena vidhānāt  /
translated: Or it is a subsidiary action because of being a remainder, like the taking up, because of being enjoined for that purpose.

analyzed: aṅgānām mukhya kāla tvāt vacanāt anya kāla tvam
translated: Because of the principal time of the limbs, the other time is by statement.

original: dravyasya karmakālaniṣpatteḥ prayogaḥ sarvārthaḥ syāt svakālatvāt / / / /
analyzed: dravyasya karma kāla niṣpatteḥ prayogaḥ sarva arthaḥ syāt sva kāla tvāt
translated: The performance would be for all purposes because of the completion of the substance at the time of the action, because of its own time.

analyzed: yūpaḥ ca a karma kāla tvāt
translated: And the sacrificial post because of not being at the time of the action.

analyzed: eka yūpam ca darṣayati  /
translated: And it shows the single sacrificial post.

analyzed: saṃskārāḥ tu āvarteran artha kāla tvāt  /
translated: But the purificatory rites would be repeated because of being at the time of the purpose.

original: tatkālas tu yūpakarmatvāt tasya dharmavidhānāt sarvārthānāṃ ca vacanād anyakālatvam / / / /
analyzed: tad kālaḥ tu yūpa karma tvāt tasya dharma vidhānāt sarva arthānām ca vacanāt anya kāla tvam  /
translated: But that time is not the time for it, because of the injunction of its dharma in connection with the sacrificial post, and because of the statement that all the purposes are for another time.

analyzed: sakṛt mānam ca darśayati
translated: And it shows the measurement once.

analyzed: svaruḥ tantra apavargaḥ syāt a svakāla tvāt
translated: The Svaru would be the end of the Tantra, because it is not the proper time.

analyzed: sādhāraṇe vā anuniṣpattiḥ tasya sādhāraṇa tvāt
translated: Or in the common, the completion of the Anuni, because of its common nature.

analyzed: soma ante ca pratipatti darśanāt
translated: And at the end of the Soma, the initiation is seen.

analyzed: na ca utpatti vākya tvāt pradeśāt prastare tathā
translated: And not so in the Prastara, because of the origin statement and because of the section.

original: ahargaṇe viṣāṇāprāsanaṃ dharmavipratiṣedhād ante prathame vāhani vikalpaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: ahar gaṇe viṣāṇā prāsanam dharma vipratiṣedhāt ante prathame vā ahani vikalpaḥ syāt  /
translated: In the Aharguna, the throwing away of the horn is at the end or in the first day, there would be an option, because of the contradiction of dharma.

original: pāṇes tv aśrutibhūtatvād viṣāṇāniyamaḥ syāt prātaḥ savanamadhyatvāc chiṣṭe cābhipravṛttatvāt / / / /
analyzed: pāṇeḥ tu a śruti bhūta tvāt viṣāṇā niyamaḥ syāt prātar savana madhya tvāt śiṣṭe ca abhipravṛtta tvāt  /
translated: But because of the non-hearing of the hand, there would be a restriction on the horn, because of being in the middle of the morning pressing, and because of being engaged in the remaining.

analyzed: śiṣṭhe ca abhipravṛtta tvāt
translated: And because of being engaged in the remaining.

analyzed: vāgvisargaḥ haviṣkṛtā vījabhede tathā syāt
translated: The discharge of speech by the one who has prepared the oblation would be so in the case of a difference in the seed.

analyzed: yathā āhvānam api iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is like the invocation.

analyzed: paśau ca puroḍāśe samāna tantram bhavet
translated: And in the animal and the cake, there would be the same Tantra.

analyzed: aṅga pradhāna arthaḥ yogaḥ sarva apavarge vimokaḥ syāt
translated: The yoga for the purpose of the subsidiary and primary is the release at the end of all.

analyzed: pradhāna apavarge vā tad artha tvāt
translated: Or at the end of the principal rite, because it serves that purpose.

analyzed: avabhṛthe ca tadvat pradhāna arthasya pratiṣedhaḥ u pavṛkta artha tvāt  /
translated: And similarly at the final bath, the prohibition of what serves the principal rite is because it serves the purpose of the conclusion.

analyzed: ahargaṇe ca pratyaham syāt tad artha tvāt  /
translated: And in the group of days, it should be done every day, because it serves that purpose.

analyzed: subrahmaṇyā tu tantram dīkṣā vat anya kāla tvāt
translated: But in the Subrahmanya invocation, it is a complete performance, like the initiation, because it is done at a different time.

analyzed: tad kālāt tu ādāvarteta prayāgataḥ viśeṣa sambandhāt  /
translated: But at that time, it should be repeated at the beginning, because of the connection with the special, from the departure.

analyzed: a prayoga aṅgam iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is not a part of the performance,

analyzed: prayoga nirdeśāt karsṛ bheda vat
translated: because of the direction of the performance, like the difference in the cutting.

original: tadbhūtasthānād agnivad iti cet tadapavargas tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: tad bhūta sthānāt agni vat iti ced tad apavargaḥ tad artha tvāt
translated: If it is argued that it is like the fire, because it is in the same place, that is the end, because it serves that purpose.

analyzed: agni vat iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is like the fire,

analyzed: na prayoga sādhāraṇyāt
translated: no, because of the commonality with the performance.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the seen indication.

analyzed: tat hi tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is so because of that,

analyzed: na a śiṣṭa tvāt itara nyāya tvāt ca
translated: no, because of the non-establishedness and because of the other rule.

analyzed: vidhi ekatvāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is because of the oneness of the injunction,

analyzed: na kṛtsnasya punar prayogāt pradhāna vat
translated: no, because of the repetition of the whole again, like the principal.

analyzed: laukike tu yathākāmī saṃskāra anartha lopāt
translated: But in the worldly, as one desires, because of the non-loss of the purifications and the non-purpose.

analyzed: yajña āyudhāni dhāryeran pratipatti vidhānāt ṛjīṣa vat
translated: The sacrificial implements should be held, because of the injunction of the practice, like the chaff.

original: yajamānasaṃskāro vā tadarthaḥ śrūyate tatra yathākāmī tadarthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: yajamāna saṃskāraḥ vā tad arthaḥ śrūyate tatra yathākāmī tad artha tvāt  /
translated: Or the consecration of the sacrificer is heard to be for that purpose there, as desired by him, because it is for that purpose.

analyzed: mukhya dhāraṇam vā maraṇasya aniyata tvāt
translated: Or the principal holding, because the time of death is uncertain.

original: yo vā yajanīye 'hani mriyeta so 'dhikṛtaḥ syād upaveṣavat / / / /
analyzed: yaḥ vā yajanīye hani mriyeta saḥ dhikṛtaḥ syāt upaveṣa vat
translated: Or he who would die on the sacrificial day would be entitled, like the Upaveśa.

analyzed: na śāstra lakṣaṇa tvāt  /
translated: Not so, because it has the characteristics of the scriptures.

analyzed: utpattiḥ vā prayojaka tvāt āśira vat
translated: Or the origin is the motivator, because of the connection, like the Āśira.

analyzed: iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is not so because of the non-connection of the word,

analyzed: tathā āśire pi
translated: so also in the Āśira.

original: śāstrāt tu viprayogas tatraikadravyacikīrṣā prakṛtāv athehāpūrvārthavad bhūtopadeśaḥ / / / /
analyzed: śāstrāt tu viprayogaḥ tatra eka dravya cikīrṣā prakṛtau atha iha apūrva artha vat bhūta upadeśaḥ
translated: But there is disconnection from the scripture there, the desire for one substance in the archetype, and here the teaching of the past is like that of the unseen purpose.

analyzed: prakṛti artha tvāt paurṇamāsyāḥ kriyeran  /
translated: Because of being for the purpose of the archetype, they should be performed on the full moon day.

analyzed: agnyādheye vā a vipratiṣedhāt tāni dhārayet maraṇasya animittavāt
translated: Or in the agni-ādheya, because there is no prohibition, he should hold those, because the time of death is not a reason.

analyzed: pratipattiḥ vā yathā anyeṣām
translated: Or the understanding should be as for others.

analyzed: upariṣṭāt somānām prājāpatyaiḥ caranti iti
translated: Above, they perform with the Prājāpatya offerings after the Soma sacrifices.

analyzed: aṅga viparyāsaḥ vinā vacanāt iti ced
translated: If it be said that there is inversion of the parts without the statement,

analyzed: utkarṣaḥ saṃyogāt kāla mātram itaratra
translated: the postponement is due to the connection, the time is only otherwise.

analyzed: prakṛti kāla āsatteḥ śastravatām iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is because the time of the archetype does not exist for those with the weapon,

analyzed: na śruti pratiṣedhāt
translated: Not by the prohibition of the Veda...

analyzed: vikāra sthāne iti ced
translated: If it be said that it is in the place of modification...

analyzed: na codanā pṛthaktvāt
translated: Not so, because of the separateness of the injunction...

original: utkarṣe sūktavākasya na somadevatānām utkarṣaḥ paśvanaṅgatvād yathā niṣkarṣenānvayaḥ / / / /
analyzed: utkarṣe sūktavākasya na soma devatānām utkarṣaḥ paśu anaṅga tvāt yathā niṣkarṣena anvayaḥ  /
translated: In the case of the Sūktavāka being postponed, there is no postponement of the deities of the Soma, because it is not a subsidiary to the animal sacrifice, just as there is connection by removal...

analyzed: vākya saṃyogāt vā utkarṣaḥ samāna tantra tvāt artha lopāt ananvayaḥ  /
translated: Or there is postponement by connection with the sentence, because of being of the same Tantra, there is no connection by the omission of the meaning...

analyzed: codanā ekatvāt rājasūye n ukta deśa kālānām samavāyāt tantram aṅgāni  /
translated: Because of the oneness of the injunction, the subsidiaries are a Tantra at the Rājasūya of those whose place and time are not mentioned, due to their coming together...

original: pratidakṣiṇaṃ vā kartṛsambandhād iṣṭivad aṅgabhūtatvāt samudāyo hi tannirvṛttyātadekatvād ekatvād ekaśabdopadeśaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: pratidakṣiṇam vā kartṛ sambandhāt iṣṭi vat aṅga bhūta tvāt samudāyaḥ hi tad nirvṛttyā a tad ekatvāt ekatvāt eka śabda upadeśaḥ syāt  /
translated: Or for each Dakṣiṇā, because of the connection with the performer, like an Iṣṭi, because of being a subsidiary, for the aggregate is accomplished by that... Because of the oneness of that, there would be instruction with the word one...

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And the seeing of another meaning is like that...

analyzed: aniyamaḥ syāt iti ced
translated: If it be said that there would be no restriction...

analyzed: na upadiṣṭa tvāt
translated: Not so, because of the non-instruction...

analyzed: prayojana ekatvāt
translated: Because of the oneness of the purpose...

analyzed: a viśeṣa arthā punar śrutiḥ
translated: The repetition is for the sake of a non-distinction...

original: aveṣṭau caikatantryaṃ syāl liṅgadarśanād vacanāt kāmasaṃyogena / / / /
analyzed: aveṣṭau ca aikatantryam syāt liṅga darśanāt vacanāt kāma saṃyogena
translated: And in the Avesti, there would be oneness of Tantra, because of the seeing of the indication, by the statement, in connection with the desire...

analyzed: kratu arthāyām iti ced na varṇa saṃyogāt
translated: If it be said that it is for the sake of the sacrifice, not so, because of the connection with the caste...

analyzed: pavamāna haviḥṣu aikatantrya prayoga vacana ekatvāt
translated: In the case of the oblations to Pavamāna, there is unity of procedure due to the unity of the injunctive statement.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And also because of the indication of a mark.

analyzed: vartamāna apadeśāt vacanāt tu tantra bhedaḥ syāt
translated: But there would be a difference in the procedure due to the statement of the present tense.

analyzed: sahatve nitya anuvādaḥ syāt
translated: If it were simultaneous, it would be a permanent restatement.

original: dvādaśāhe tu prakṛtitvād ekaikam ahar apavṛjyeta karmapṛthaktvāt / / / /
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tu prakṛti tvāt ekaikam ahar apavṛjyeta karma pṛthaktvāt  /
translated: But in the Dvādaśāha, due to being the archetype, each day would be separated, because of the separateness of the rites.

original: ahrāṃ vā śrutibhūtatvāt tatra sāṅgaṃ kriyeta yathā mādhyandine / / / /
analyzed: ahrām vā śruti bhūta tvāt tatra sa aṅgam kriyeta yathā mādhyandine
translated: Or on the day, because of being directly stated, the rite with its auxiliaries would be performed there, just as in the midday.

original: api vā phalakartṛsambandhāt saha prayogaḥ syād āgneyāgnīṣomīyavat / / / /
analyzed: api vā phala kartṛ sambandhāt saha prayogaḥ syāt āgneya agnīṣomīya vat
translated: Or, due to the connection with the result and the agent, there would be a simultaneous performance, like the Āgneya and Āgneya-Agnīṣomīya.

analyzed: sa aṅga kāla śruti tvāt vā sva sthānānām vikāraḥ syāt
translated: Or, due to the direct statement of the time with its auxiliaries, there would be a modification of the original positions.

analyzed: dīkṣā upasadām ca saṃkhyā pṛthak pṛthak pratyakṣa saṃyogāt
translated: And the number of the Dīkṣā and Upasads is separate, due to the direct connection with each.

original: vasatīvarīparyantāni pūrvāṇi tantram anyakālatvād avabhṛthādīny uttarāṇi dīkṣāvisargārthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vasatīvarī paryantāni pūrvāṇi tantram anya kāla tvāt avabhṛtha ādīni uttarāṇi dīkṣā visarga artha tvāt  /
translated: The earlier ones ending with the Vasatīvarī are the procedure, because they are at a different time, and the later ones beginning with the Avabhṛtha are for the purpose of releasing the consecration.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And there is the observation of another purpose in that way.

analyzed: codanā pṛthaktve tu aikatantryam samavetānām kāla saṃyogāt
translated: But in the case of the separateness of injunctions, there is unity of procedure for the combined ones, due to the connection with time.

original: bhedas tu tadbhedāt karamabhedaḥ prayoge syāt teṣāṃ pradhānaśabdatvāt / / / /
analyzed: bhedaḥ tu tad bhedāt karama bhedaḥ prayoge syāt teṣām pradhāna śabda tvāt
translated: But the difference is due to the difference in that, the performance should be the same, because they are words denoting the principal act.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And so there is the perception of another meaning.

analyzed: śva āsutyā vacanam tadvat
translated: The statement about the son of Śva is similar to that.

analyzed: paśu atirekaḥ ca
translated: And there is the exclusion of the animal.

original: sutyāvivṛddhau subrahmaṇyāyāṃ sarveṣām upalakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtyanvayād āvāhanavat / / / /
analyzed: sutyā vivṛddhau subrahmaṇyāyām sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam prakṛti anvayāt āvāhana vat  /
translated: In the expansion of the Sutyā, in the Subrahmaṇyā, all are to be indicated, because of the connection with the original, like the invocation.

original: api vendrābhidhānatvāt sakṛt syād upalakṣaṇaṃ kālasya lakṣaṇārthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā indra abhidhāna tvāt sakṛt syāt upalakṣaṇam kālasya lakṣaṇa artha tvāt  /
translated: Or it should be done once, because it is designated as Indra, because the indication of time is for the purpose of indication.

analyzed: avibhāgāt ca
translated: And because there is no division.

analyzed: paśu gaṇe kumbhī śūla vapāśrapaṇīnām prabhu tvāt tantra bhāvaḥ syāt
translated: In the group of animals, the pot, the stake, the omentum, and the ladle, because of the predominance, there would be the nature of a subsidiary act.

analyzed: bhedaḥ tu sandehāt devatā antare syāt
translated: But the difference is due to doubt, it would be in another deity.

original: arthād vā liṅgakarma syāt / / / /🔽pratipādyatvād vasānāṃ bhedaḥ syāt svayājyāpradānatvāt / / / /
analyzed: arthāt vā liṅga karma syāt  pratipādya tvāt vasānām bhedaḥ syāt sva yājyā pradāna tvāt
translated: Or the act would be indicated by the meaning.🔽Or there would be a difference in the offering of the omentum, because it is not to be given to one's own sacrificer.

original: api vā pratipattitvāt tantraṃ syāt svatvasyāśrutibhūtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: api vā pratipatti tvāt tantram syāt sva tvasya a śruti bhūta tvāt
translated: Or it should be a subsidiary act, because of the nature of being obtained, because the ownership is not heard.

analyzed: sakṛt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it is once,

analyzed: na kāla bhedāt
translated: no, because of the difference in time.

analyzed: pakti bhedāt kumbhī śūla vapā śraraṇīnām bhedaḥ syāt
translated: The pot, the stake, the omentum, and the ladle would be different because of the difference in cooking.

analyzed: jāti antareṣu bhedaḥ pakti vaiṣamyāt
translated: The difference in other species is due to the inequality of digestion.

analyzed: vṛddhi darśanāt ca
translated: And also because of the observation of increase.

analyzed: kapālāni ca kumbhī vat tulya saṃkhyānām
translated: And the skull bones, like the pot, are of equal number.

analyzed: pratipradhānam vā prakṛti vat
translated: Or for each principal act, like the original.

analyzed: sarveṣām vā abhiprathamam syāt
translated: Or it should be for all at the beginning.

analyzed: eka dravye saṃskārāṇām vyākhyātam eka karma tvāt  /
translated: In one substance, the modification of the rites has been explained because of the single action.

original: dravyāntare kṛtārthatvāt tasya punaḥ prayogān mantrasya ca tadguṇatvāt punaḥ prayogaḥ syāt tadarthena vidhānāt / / / /
analyzed: dravya antare kṛtārtha tvāt tasya punar prayogāt mantrasya ca tad guṇa tvāt punar prayogaḥ syāt tad arthena vidhānāt  /
translated: In another substance, because of the fulfillment of its purpose, and because of the quality of that mantra, there would be a repetition of the use of the mantra.

analyzed: nirvapaṇa lavana staraṇa ājya grahaṇeṣu ca eka dravya vat prayojana eka tvāt  /
translated: And in the pouring out, cutting, spreading, and taking of the clarified butter, like in one substance, because of the oneness of purpose.

analyzed: dravya antara vat vā syāt tad saṃskārāt
translated: Or it would be like in another substance, because of the modification of that.

analyzed: vedi prokṣaṇe mantra abhyāsaḥ karmaṇaḥ punar prayogāt  /
translated: In the sprinkling of the altar, there is repetition of the mantra because of the repetition of the action.

original: ekasya vā guṇavidhir dravyaikatvāt tasmāt sakṛt prayogaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: ekasya vā guṇa vidhiḥ dravya eka tvāt tasmāt sakṛt prayogaḥ syāt
translated: Or for one, there is an injunction of a quality because of the oneness of the substance. Therefore, there would be a single use.

analyzed: kaṇḍūyane pratyaṅgam karma bhedāt syāt
translated: In the scratching, for each limb, there is a difference of action.

analyzed: api vā codana eka kālam aikakarmyam syāt
translated: Or, because of the simultaneity of the injunction, there would be oneness of action.

analyzed: svapna nadī taraṇa abhivarṣaṇa amedhya pratimantraṇeṣu ca evam
translated: And in the case of crossing a river in a dream, being rained upon, and being addressed by an impure person, it is the same...

analyzed: prayāṇe tu ā artha nirvṛtteḥ
translated: ...but in the case of departure, it is due to the accomplishment of the purpose.

analyzed: uparava mantraḥ tantram syāt loka vat bahuvacanāt  /
translated: The Uparava mantra should be a Tantra, like in the world, because of the plural ending.

original: na sannipātitvād asannipātikarmaṇāṃ viśeṣagrahaṇe kālaikatvāt sakṛd vacanam / / / /
analyzed: na sannipāti tvāt a sannipāti karmaṇām viśeṣa grahaṇe kāla eka tvāt sakṛt vacanam  /
translated: ...because of the non-combination of the non-combined rites, the specification is due to the oneness of time, the statement is made once.

analyzed: haviṣkṛt adhrigu puro nuvākyā manotasya āvṛttiḥ kāla bhedāt syāt
translated: In the case of the Havis-making, Adhrigu, and Puronuvakya, the repetition is due to the difference in time.

analyzed: adhrigoḥ ca viparyāsāt
translated: And of the Adhrigu, due to the reversal.

analyzed: kariṣyat vacanāt
translated: Due to the statement of the one who will do.

original: tantrisamavāye codanātaḥ samānānām ekatantryam atulyeṣu tu bhedaḥ syād vidhiprakramatād arthyāt śrutikālanirdeśāt / / / /
analyzed: tantri samavāye codanātaḥ samānānām eka tantryam atulyeṣu tu bhedaḥ syāt arthyāt śruti kāla nirdeśāt
translated: And in the combination of the three, due to the injunction, the sameness of the equal ones, but in the unequal ones, there would be a difference, due to the sequence of the injunction, from the useful, from the indication of the time of the Vedic text.

analyzed: guṇa kāla vikārāt ca tantra bhedaḥ syāt
translated: And due to the modification of the time of the quality, there would be a difference in the Tantra.

original: tantramadhye vidhānād vā mukhyatantreṇa siddhiḥ syāt tantrārthasyāviśiṣṭatvāt / / / /
analyzed: tantra madhye vidhānāt vā mukhya tantreṇa siddhiḥ syāt tantra arthasya a viśiṣṭa tvāt
translated: Or due to the injunction in the middle of the Tantra, the accomplishment would be with the principal Tantra, because the meaning of the Tantra is not distinguished.

original: vikārāc ca na bhedaḥ syād arthasyāvikṛtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vikārāt ca na bhedaḥ syāt arthasya a vikṛta tvāt
translated: And due to the modification, there would be no difference, because the meaning is not modified.

analyzed: ekeṣām vā aśakya tvāt
translated: Or of some, because of the impossibility.

analyzed: āhopurīṣakam syāt
translated: It would be the Ahāpuṣa.🔽...

analyzed: eka agni vat ca darśanam
translated: And the view is like the one-fire...

analyzed: jaimineḥ paratantra tva āpatteḥ svatantra pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: For Jaimini, there would be a prohibition of independence due to the contingency of dependence...

analyzed: nānā artha tvāt some darśa pūrṇamāsa prakṛtīnām vedi karma syāt
translated: In the Soma, due to having multiple meanings, the Vedic ritual of the archetypes of the new and full moon sacrifices would be...

analyzed: akarma vā kṛta dūṣā syāt
translated: Or it would be a fault in what is done, being not a ritual...

analyzed: pātreṣu ca prasaṅgaḥ syāt homa artha tvāt
translated: And there would be an extension to the vessels, because they are for the purpose of the oblation...

original: nyāyyāni vā prayuktatvād aprayukte prasaṅgaḥ syāt / / / /🔽śāmitre ca paśupuroḍāśo na syād itarasya prayuktatvāt / / / /
analyzed: nyāyyāni vā prayukta tvāt a prayukte prasaṅgaḥ syāt  śāmitre ca paśupuroḍāśaḥ na syāt itarasya prayukta tvāt  /
translated: Or it is proper, because of being used. There would be an extension to what is not used...🔽And in the Shamitra, there would be no animal cake of the other, because of being used...

original: śrapaṇaṃ vāgnihotrasya śālāmukhīye na syāt prājahitasya vidyamānatvāt / / / /
analyzed: śrapaṇam vā agnihotrasya śālāmukhīye na syāt prājahitasya vidyamāna tvāt
translated: The cooking of the Agnihotra would not be in the Shramamukhiye, because of the existence of what is already offered...

analyzed: havirdhāne nirvapaṇa artham sādhayetām prayukta tvāt
translated: They would accomplish it for the purpose of pouring out in the Havirdhana, because of being used...

original: asiddhir vānyadeśatvāt pradhānavaiguṇyād avaiguṇye prasaṅgaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: asiddhiḥ vā anya deśa tvāt pradhāna vaiguṇyāt avaiguṇye prasaṅgaḥ syāt
translated: Or it is not established, because of being in another place. In the absence of deficiency of the primary, there would be an extension...

analyzed: anasām ca darśanāt
translated: And because of seeing the Anus...

analyzed: tad yukta tvam ca kāla bhedāt
translated: And the connection is due to the difference in time...

analyzed: mantrāḥ ca sannipāti tvāt
translated: And the mantras, because of being assembled...

analyzed: dhāraṇa artha tvāt some gni anvādhānam na vidyate
translated: In the Soma, the kindling of the fire is not done, because of the purpose of holding...

analyzed: tathā vratam apeta tvāt
translated: Similarly, the vow is not, because of being departed...

analyzed: vipratiṣedhāt ca
translated: And because of contradiction...

analyzed: satyavat iti ced
translated: If it be said that (it is) like truth...

analyzed: na saṃyoga pṛthaktvāt  /
translated: No, because of the separateness of the conjunction.

analyzed: graha artham ca pūrvam iṣṭeḥ tad artha tvāt
translated: And the sacrifice is for the sake of the cup, because it is for that purpose.

original: śeṣavad iti cen na vaiśvadevo hi syād vyapadeśāt / / / /
analyzed: śeṣavat iti ced na vaiśvadevaḥ hi syāt vyapadeśāt
translated: If it be said that (it is) like the remainder, no; for the Vaisvadeva would be (performed), because of the designation.

analyzed: na guṇa artha tvāt
translated: No, because it is for the sake of the quality.

analyzed: sannahanam ca vṛtta tvāt
translated: And the girding, because it is a rite.

original: anyavidhānād āraṇyabhojanaṃ na syād ubhayaṃ hi vṛttyartham / / / /
analyzed: anya vidhānāt āraṇya bhojanam na syāt ubhayam hi vṛtti artham
translated: The eating of the wild (rice) would not be (performed), because of the enjoining of another (rite), for both serve the purpose of a rite.

analyzed: śeṣa bhakṣāḥ tathā iti ced na anya artha tvāt
translated: If it be said that the eating of the remainder is in the same way, no; because it has another purpose.

analyzed: bhṛta tvāt ca parikrayaḥ
translated: And the purchase is because of being hired.

analyzed: śeṣa bhakṣāḥ tathā iti ced
translated: If it be said that the eating of the remainder is in the same way...

analyzed: na karma saṃyogāt
translated: No, because of the connection with the rite.

original: pravṛttavaraṇāt prati tantravaraṇāt pratitantravaraṇaṃ hotuḥ kriyeta / / / /
analyzed: pravṛtta varaṇāt prati tantra varaṇāt prati tantra varaṇam hotuḥ kriyeta  /
translated: Because of the commencement of the selection, the selection should be done for each branch by the Hotri.

analyzed: brahmā api iti ced
translated: If it be said that (it should be done) by the Brahman also...

analyzed: na prāk niyamāt tad artham hi
translated: No, because of the rule before (the selection); for it is for that purpose.

analyzed: nirdiṣṭasya iti ced
translated: If it be said that (it should be done) by the one who is designated...

analyzed: na śruta tvāt
translated: No, because of the declaration.

analyzed: hotuḥ tathā iti ced
translated: If it be said that (it should be done) by the Hotri in the same way...

analyzed: na karma saṃyogāt
translated: No, because of the connection with the rite.

analyzed: yajña utpatti upadeśe niṣṭhita karma prayoga bhedāt pratitantram kriyeta
translated: In the teaching of the origin of the sacrifice, it should be done for each branch, because of the difference in the application of the rite that is completed.

analyzed: deśa pṛthaktvāt mantraḥ vyāvartate
translated: The mantra is repeated due to the difference of place.

analyzed: sannahana haraṇe tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the yoking and carrying are also like that,

analyzed: na anya artha tvāt
translated: it is not so, because it has a different purpose.

analyzed: vihāraḥ laukikānām artham sādhayet prabhu tvāt
translated: The enjoyment would accomplish the purpose of worldly people due to the power.

analyzed: māṃsa pāka pratiṣedhaḥ ca tadvat
translated: And the prohibition of meat cooking is like that.

analyzed: nirdeśāt vā vaidikānām syāt
translated: Or it would be of the Vedic ones due to the instruction.

analyzed: sati ca upāsanasya darśanāt
translated: And because the meditation is seen when it exists.

analyzed: abhāva darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the non-existence seen.

analyzed: māṃsapākaḥ vihita pratiṣedhaḥ syāt āhuti saṃyogāt
translated: The meat cooking would be a prohibited injunction due to the connection with the oblation.

analyzed: vākya śeṣaḥ vā dakṣiṇasmin anārabhya vidhānasya
translated: Or the remainder of the sentence is in the southern, of the injunction not beginning with anything.

original: savanīye chidrāpidhānārthatvāt paśupuroḍāśo na syād anyeṣām evam arthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: savanīye chidra apidhāna artha tvāt paśupuroḍāśaḥ na syāt anyeṣām evam artha tvāt  /
translated: The animal cake would not be for the purpose of covering the hole in the Savanīya, because it serves the same purpose for others.

analyzed: kriyā vā devatā artha tvāt
translated: Or the action, because it is for the sake of the deity.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt
translated: Because of the seen indication.

original: haviṣkṛt savanīyeṣu na syāt prakṛtau yadi sarvārthā paśuṃ pratyāhūtā sā kuryād vidyamānatvāt / / / /
analyzed: haviṣkṛt savanīyeṣu na syāt prakṛtau yadi sarva arthā paśum pratyāhūtā sā kuryāt vidyamāna tvāt  /
translated: The Haviskṛt would not be in the Savanīya if in the archetype, if the one called for the animal is for all purposes, it would do so because it exists.

analyzed: paśau tu saṃskṛte vidhānāt
translated: But in the consecrated animal, because of the injunction.

original: yogād vā yajñāya tadvimoke visargaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: yogāt vā yajñāya tad vimoke visargaḥ syāt  /
translated: Or due to the connection, the release would be for the release of that for the sacrifice.

analyzed: niśi yajñe prākṛtasya apravṛttiḥ syāt pratyakṣa śiṣṭa tvāt
translated: In a night sacrifice, the performance of an ordinary rite would not be possible, because it is directly enjoined.

original: kālavākyabhedāc ca tantrabhedaḥ syāt / / / /🔽vedyuddhananavrataṃ vipratiṣedhāt tad eva syāt / / / /
analyzed: kāla vākya bhedāt ca tantra bhedaḥ syāt  vedi uddhanana vratam vipratiṣedhāt tat eva syāt
translated: And there would be a difference in the procedure due to the difference in time and sentence.🔽The vow of the battle of the Veda should be the same, due to the contradiction.

analyzed: tantra madhye vidhānāt vā tad tantrā savanīya vat
translated: Or, because of the injunction in the middle of the procedure, it belongs to that procedure, like the Savaniya.

original: vaiguṇyād idhmabarhir na sādhayed agnyanvādhānaṃ ca yadi devatārtham / / / /
analyzed: vaiguṇyāt idhma barhiḥ na sādhayet agni anvādhānam ca yadi devatā artham
translated: If the kindling of the fire is for the sake of the deity, one should not accomplish the sacrificial grass and faggot due to the defect.

analyzed: agni anvādhānam ca yadi devatā artham
translated: And if the kindling of the fire is for the sake of the deity.

original: ārambhaṇīyā vikṛtau na syāt prakṛtikālamadhyatvāt kṛtā punas tadarthena / / / /
analyzed: ārambhaṇīyā vikṛtau na syāt prakṛti kāla madhya tvāt kṛtā punar tad arthena
translated: The Ārambhaṇīyā would not be in the modification, because it is in the middle of the time of the archetype, but it is done again for that purpose.

analyzed: sakṛt ārambha saṃyogāt  /
translated: Because of the connection with the single beginning.

analyzed: syāt vā kālasya aśeṣa bhūta tvāt
translated: Or it may be, because the time is subordinate.

analyzed: āraṃbha vibhāgāt ca
translated: And because of the division of the beginning.

analyzed: vipratiṣiddha dharmāṇām samavāye bhūyasām syāt sadharmaka tvam
translated: In the combination of contradictory properties, there would be the property of the majority.

analyzed: mukhyam vā pūrva codanāt lokavat  /
translated: Or the primary one, because of the earlier injunction, like in the world.

analyzed: tathā ca anya artha darśanam
translated: And there is the observation of another meaning in that way.

analyzed: aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt
translated: And in the contradiction of the subsidiary and quality, because of the purpose of that.

analyzed: paridheḥ dvi artha tvāt ubhaya dharmā syāt
translated: Because of the twofold purpose of the enclosing sticks, there would be the property of both.

analyzed: yaupyaḥ tu virodhe syāt mukhya ānantaryāt
translated: But the Yaupya (rite) should be in case of conflict, because of the proximity of the principal (rite).

original: itaro vā tasya tatra vidhānād ubhayoś cāṅgasaṃyogaḥ / / / /
analyzed: itaraḥ vā tasya tatra vidhānāt ubhayoḥ ca aṅga saṃyogaḥ  /
translated: Or the other (rite), because of its injunction there, and both are connected with the subsidiary (rite).

original: paśusavanīyeṣu vikalpaḥ syād vaikṛtaś ced ubhayor aśrutibhūtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: paśu savanīyeṣu vikalpaḥ syāt vaikṛtaḥ ced ubhayoḥ a śruti bhūta tvāt
translated: In the case of the Savaniya animals, there would be an option, if it is a modification, because both are not heard.

original: pāśukaṃ vā tasya vaiśeṣikāmnānāt tadanarthakaṃ vikalpe syāt / / / /
analyzed: pāśukam vā tasya vaiśeṣika āmnānāt tat anarthakam vikalpe syāt
translated: Or the animal (rite), because of the special mention of it. In the option, that would be meaningless.

analyzed: paśoḥ ca viprakarṣaḥ tantra madhye vidhānāt  /
translated: And the animal (rite) is remote, because of the injunction in the middle of the procedure.

original: apūrvaṃ ca prakṛtau samānatantrā ced anityatvād anarthakaṃ hi syāt / / / /
analyzed: apūrvam ca prakṛtau samāna tantrā ced anitya tvāt anarthakam hi syāt
translated: And the unseen (result) is in the archetype, if it is of the same procedure, because of the impermanence, it would indeed be meaningless.

original: adhikaś ca guṇaḥ sādhāraṇe 'virodhāt kāṃsyabhojivad amukhye 'pi / / / /
analyzed: adhikaḥ ca guṇaḥ sādhāraṇe virodhāt kāṃsya bhoji vat amukhye pi
translated: And the additional quality is in the common (rite), because of non-contradiction, like the eating from a bronze vessel, even in the non-primary (rite).

original: tatpravṛttyā tu tantrasya niyamaḥ syād yathā pāśukaṃ sūktapākena / / / /
analyzed: tad pravṛttyā tu tantrasya niyamaḥ syāt yathā pāśukam sūktapākena
