translated: But by the application of that, there would be a restriction of the procedure, like the animal (rite) with the Sukta-pâka (mantra).

analyzed: na vā avirodhāt
translated: Or not, because of non-contradiction.

analyzed: a śāstra lakṣaṇa tvāt ca
translated: And because of not being characterized by the scriptures.

original: viśvajiti vatsatvaṅnāmadheyād itarathā tantrabhūyastvād ahataṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: viśvajiti vatsatvac nāmadheyāt itarathā tantra bhūyaḥ tvāt ahatam syāt  /
translated: In the Vishvajit, because of the name Vatsatva (cow-skin), otherwise, because of the abundance of the procedure, it would be unwoven.

analyzed: avirodhī vā upari vāsaḥ hi vatsa tvac
translated: Or it is not contradictory, because the upper garment is the cow-skin.

original: anunirvāpyeṣu bhūyastvena tantraniyamaḥ syāc chviṣṭhakṛddarśanāc ca / / / /
analyzed: anunirvāpyeṣu bhūyaḥ tvena tantra niyamaḥ syāt śviṣṭhakṛt darśanāt ca  /
translated: In the Anuniṣṭhāna rites, the rules of the Tantra should generally apply, because of the declaration of the Śviṣṭakṛt.

original: āgantukatvād vā svadharmā syāc chrutiviśeṣād itarasya ca mukhyatvāt / / / /
analyzed: āgantuka tvāt vā svadharmā syāt śruti viśeṣāt itarasya ca mukhya tvāt
translated: Or, because of being adventitious, its own Dharma would apply, due to the specificity of the Vedic text, and because the other is primary.

analyzed: sva sthāna tvāt ca
translated: And because it is in its own place.

analyzed: sviṣṭakṛt śrapaṇāt na iti ced vikāraḥ pavamāna vat
translated: If it is argued that the Śviṣṭakṛt should not be offered because it is a modification, like the Pavamāna.

original: avikāro vā prakṛtivac codanāṃ prati bhāvāc ca / / / /🔽eka karmaṇi śiṣṭatvād guṇānāṃ sarvakarma syāt / / / /
analyzed: avikāraḥ vā prakṛti vat codanām prati bhāvāt ca  eka karmaṇi śiṣṭa tvāt guṇānām sarva karma syāt
translated: Or it is not a modification, like the original, because it exists in relation to the injunction.🔽Because of being enjoined in one ritual, the qualities should apply to all rituals.

original: ekārthās tu vikalperan samuccaye hy āvṛttiḥ syāt pradhānasya / / / /
analyzed: eka arthāḥ tu vikalperan samuccaye hi āvṛttiḥ syāt pradhānasya
translated: But they would be optional for the same purpose, because in combination there would be repetition of the primary act.

analyzed: abhyasyeta arthavat tvāt iti ced
translated: If it is argued that it should be repeated because it has a purpose.

original: nāśrutatvād dhi vikalpavac ca darśayati kālāntare 'rthavattvaṃ syāt / / / /
analyzed: na a śruta tvāt hi vikalpavat ca darśayati kāla antare rthavat tvam syāt
translated: Not so, because it is not heard. It shows like an option. At a different time, it would have a purpose.

original: prāyaścitteṣu caikārthyān niṣpannenābhisaṃyogas tasmāt sarvasya nirghātaḥ / / / /
analyzed: prāyaścitteṣu ca aikārthyāt niṣpannena abhisaṃyogaḥ tasmāt sarvasya nirghātaḥ  /
translated: And in the expiatory rites, because of the same purpose, there is connection with the completed [rite]. Therefore, all is destroyed.

analyzed: samuccayaḥ tu doṣa arthaḥ
translated: But the combination is for the purpose of a fault.

original: mantrāṇāṃ karmasaṃyogaḥ svadharmeṇa prayogaḥ syād dharmasya tannimittatvāt / / / /
analyzed: mantrāṇām karma saṃyogaḥ svadharmeṇa prayogaḥ syāt dharmasya tad nimitta tvāt  /
translated: The connection of the mantras with the ritual should be the application with their own Dharma, because the Dharma is for that purpose.

original: vidyāṃpratividhinād vā sarvakāraṇaṃ prayogaḥ syāt karmārthatvāt prayogasya / / / /
analyzed: vā sarva kāraṇam prayogaḥ syāt karma artha tvāt prayogasya
translated: Or, the application should be the cause of all by the rule of the Veda, because the application is for the sake of the ritual.

analyzed: bhāṣā svara upadeśāt aira vat prāyavacana pratiṣedhaḥ
translated: The prohibition of the general statement is like the teaching of language and voice.

original: mantropadeśo vā na bhāṣikasya prāyopapatter bhāṣikaśrutiḥ / / / /
analyzed: mantra upadeśaḥ vā na bhāṣikasya prāya upapatteḥ bhāṣika śrutiḥ
translated: Or the teaching of the mantra, because the general statement is not appropriate for the language, and the language is heard.

analyzed: vikāraḥ kāraṇa agrahaṇe tad nyāya tvāt dṛṣṭe pi evam
translated: In the absence of the cause, there is modification, because that is the rule, even in the seen.

analyzed: tad utpatteḥ vā pravacana lakṣaṇa tvāt
translated: Or because of its origin, because it is characterized by utterance.

original: mantrāṇāṃ karaṇārthatvān mantrāntena karmādisannipātaḥ syāt sarvasya vacanārthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: mantrāṇām karaṇa artha tvāt mantra antena karma ādi sannipātaḥ syāt sarvasya vacana artha tvāt
translated: Because of the purpose of the mantra, the combination of the ritual etc. with the end of the mantra should be, because all is for the sake of the statement.

analyzed: saṃtata vacanāt dhārāyām ādi saṃyogaḥ
translated: Because of the continuous statement, the connection with the beginning is in the stream.

analyzed: karama saṃtānaḥ vā nānā karma tvāt itarasya a śakca tvāt
translated: Or the series of hands, because of the different rituals, because the other is incapable.

analyzed: āghāre ca dīrgha dhāra tvāt
translated: And in the Āghāra, because of the long stream.

analyzed: mantrāṇām saṃnipāti tvāt eka arthānām vikalpaḥ syāt
translated: Because of the combination of the mantras, there should be an option for those with the same meaning.

analyzed: saṃkhyā vihiteṣu samuccayaḥ saṃnipāti tvāt
translated: In those prescribed by number, there is combination, because of non-combination.

analyzed: brāhmaṇa vihiteṣu ca saṃkhyā vat sarveṣām upadiṣṭha tvāt  /
translated: And in those prescribed by the Brāhmaṇa, like the number, because all are taught.

analyzed: yājyā vaṣaṭkārayoḥ ca samuccaya darśanam tadvat
translated: And the observation of the combination of the yājyā and vaṣaṭkāra is like that.

analyzed: vikalpaḥ vā samuccayasya aśruti tvāt
translated: Or option, because the combination is not heard.

analyzed: guṇa artha tvāt upadeśasya
translated: Because of the purpose of the quality of the instruction.

original: vaṣaṭkāre nānārthatvāt samuccayo hautrās tu vikalperann ekārthatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vaṣaṭkāre nānā artha tvāt samuccayaḥ hautrāḥ tu vikalperan eka artha tvāt
translated: In the vaṣaṭkāra, there is combination because of the different meanings, but the hotṛ's would be optional because of the same meaning.

analyzed: kriyamāṇa anuvādi tvāt samuccayaḥ vā hautrāṇām
translated: Or there is combination of the hotṛ's because it is a restatement of what is being done.

analyzed: samuccayam ca darśayati
translated: And it shows the combination.

original: japāś cākarmasaṃyuktāḥ stutyāśīrabhidhānāś ca yājamāneṣu samuccayaḥ syād āśīḥpṛthaktvāt / / / /
analyzed: japāḥ ca a karma saṃyuktāḥ stuti āśīḥ abhidhānāḥ ca yājamāneṣu samuccayaḥ syāt āśīḥ pṛthaktvāt  /
translated: And the muttering not connected with action, and the praises and benedictions mentioned, there would be combination in the yājamāna rites because of the separateness of the benediction.

analyzed: samuccayam ca darśayati
translated: And it shows the combination.

analyzed: yājyā anuvākyāsu tu vikalpaḥ syāt devatā upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt
translated: But in the yājyā and anuvākyā, there would be an option because of the purpose of indicating the deity.

analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca
translated: And because of the observation of the mark.

analyzed: krayeṣu ti vikalpaḥ syāt eka artha tvāt
translated: In the purchases, there would be an option because of the same meaning.

analyzed: samuccayaḥ vā prayoga dravya samavāyāt
translated: Or there is combination because of the connection with the substance used in the performance.

analyzed: samuccayam ca darśayati
translated: And it shows the combination.

analyzed: saṃskāre ca tad pradhāna tvāt
translated: And in the consecration, because of its being primary.

analyzed: saṃkhyāsu tu vikalpaḥ syāt śruti pratiṣedhāt
translated: But in the numbers, there would be an option because of the prohibition in the Veda.

original: dravyavikārāt tu pūrvavad arthakarma syāt tayā vikalpena niyamapradhānatvāt / / / /
analyzed: dravya vikārāt tu pūrvavat artha karma syāt tayā vikalpena niyama pradhāna tvāt
translated: But due to the modification of the substance, it should be a subsidiary act like before, because the option is subordinate to the rule.

original: dravyatve 'pi samuccayo dravyasya karmaniṣpatteḥ pratipaśukarmabhedād evaṃ sati yathāprakṛti / / / /
analyzed: dravya tve pi samuccayaḥ dravyasya karma niṣpatteḥ prati paśu karma bhedāt evam sati yathāprakṛti
translated: Even in the case of substance, there is combination, because the substance is for the completion of the action, and because the action is different for each animal. In this case, it is as per the original.

analyzed: kapāle pi tathā iti ced
translated: If it is argued that the same should be the case with the potsherd,

analyzed: na karmaṇaḥ parārtha tvāt
translated: no, because the action is for another's purpose.

analyzed: pratipattiḥ tu śeṣa tvāt
translated: But the performance is subordinate,

analyzed: śṛte pi pūrvavat syāt
translated: even in the case of the cooked, it should be as before.

original: vikalpyo 'nvarthakarmaniyamapradhānatvāc chese ca karmakāryasamavāyāt tasamāt tenārthakarma syāt / / / /
analyzed: vikalpyaḥ nu artha karma niyama pradhāna tvāt śese ca karma kārya samavāyāt tasamāt tena artha karma syāt  /
translated: It should be an option, because the action is subordinate to the rule based on the meaning, and because the action is combined with the subordinate, therefore it should be a subsidiary act.

analyzed: ukhāyām kāmya nitya samuccayaḥ niyoge kāma darśanāt
translated: In the case of the pan, there is a combination of optional and obligatory, because desire is seen in the injunction.

analyzed: asati ca a saṃskṛteṣu karma syāt
translated: And if there is no modification, the action should be performed on the unrefined.

analyzed: tasya ca devatā artha tvāt
translated: And that is for the sake of the deity.

analyzed: vikāraḥ vā nityasya agneḥ kāmyena tad ukta hetuḥ
translated: Or it is a modification of the eternal fire, because of the reason stated by the optional one.

analyzed: vacanāt a saṃskṛteṣu karma syāt
translated: By the statement, the action should be performed on the unrefined.

analyzed: saṃsarge ca api doṣaḥ syāt
translated: And even in the case of combination, there would be a fault.

original: vacanād iti ced athetarasminn utsargāparigrahaḥ karmaṇaḥ kṛtatvāt / / / /
analyzed: vacanāt iti ced atha itarasmin utsarga aparigrahaḥ karmaṇaḥ kṛta tvāt
translated: If it is argued that it is by the statement, then in the other case, there is no acceptance of the general rule, because the action has been done.

analyzed: saḥ āhavanīyaḥ syāt āhuti saṃyogāt
translated: That would be the Āhavanīya fire, because of the connection with oblations.

analyzed: anyaḥ vā uddhṛtya āharaṇāt tasmin saṃskāra karma śiṣṭa tvāt
translated: Or it is different, because of the removal and carrying away. The purificatory rite is in that, because of the declaration of the learned.

analyzed: sthānāt tu parilupyeran
translated: But they would be omitted because of the place.

original: nityādhāraṇe vikalpo na hy akasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ syāt / / / /
analyzed: nitya ādhāraṇe vikalpaḥ na hi akasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ syāt
translated: There is an option in the permanent wearing, because the prohibition would not be without reason.

analyzed: nitya dhāraṇāt vā pratiṣedhaḥ gata śriyaḥ
translated: Or the prohibition is because of the loss of glory in the permanent wearing.

analyzed: para arthāni ekaḥ pratiyanti vat satrāhīnayaḥ yajamāna gaṇe niyamaḥ viśeṣāt
translated: One who is for the sake of others is like one who is engaged, in the Satra and Ahīna sacrifices. There is no restriction in the group of sacrificers, because there is no distinction.

analyzed: mukhyaḥ vā a vipratiṣedhāt
translated: Or the principal one, because there is no contradiction.

original: satre gṛhapatir asaṃyogād dhautravad āmnāyavacanāc ca / / / /
analyzed: satre gṛhapatiḥ a saṃyogāt hautra vat āmnāya vacanāt ca
translated: In the Satra, the householder is not connected, because of the connection with the Hotra, and because of the statement of the scripture.

analyzed: sarvaiḥ vā tad artha tvāt
translated: Or by all, because it is for their sake.

analyzed: vipratiṣedhe param
translated: In case of contradiction, the later one is superior.

analyzed: hautre parārtha tvāt
translated: In the Hotra, because it is for the sake of others.

analyzed: vacanam param
translated: The statement is superior.

analyzed: prabhu tvāt ārtvijyam sarva varṇānām syāt
translated: The priestly duties would be for all the varnas because of the lordship.

analyzed: smṛteḥ vā syāt brāhmaṇānām
translated: Or it would be for the Brahmanas because of the Smriti.

analyzed: phala camasa vidhānāt ca itareṣām  /
translated: And because of the injunction of the fruit-bowl, for the others.

analyzed: sānnāyye pi evam pratiṣedhaḥ saumapīya hetu tvāt  /
translated: In the Sannāyya also, there is a prohibition in the same way, because of the reason of the Soma-offering.

analyzed: caturdhākaraṇe ca nirdeśāt
translated: And in the fourfold division, because of the direction.

analyzed: anvāhārye ca darśanāt
translated: And because of the seeing in the Anvāhārya.
